encodingDesc.p: The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text divison separates words with spaces ("ity evam" not "ityevam"), where sandhi permits.

lg.l: āsannaṃ brahmaṇas tasya tapasām uttamaṃ tapaḥ
prathamaṃ chandasām aṅgam āhur vyākaraṇaṃ budhāḥ
yat tat puṇyatamaṃ jyotis tasya mārgo+ayam āñjasaḥ
tathaiva loke vidyānām eṣā vidyā parāyaṇam
chandasyaś chandasāṃ yonim ātmā chandomayīṃ tanum
yad asminn eva tamasi jyotiḥ śuddhaṃ vivartate
anvākhyeyāś ca ye śabdā ye cāpi pratipādakāḥ
dharme ye pratyaye cāṅgaṃ saṃbandhāḥ sādhvasādhuṣu
te liṅgaiś ca svaśabdaiś ca śāstre+asminn upavarṇitāḥ
smṛtyartham anugamyante ke cid eva yathāgamam
nityatve kṛtakatve vā teṣām ādir na vidyate
nānarthikām imāṃ kaś cid vyavasthāṃ kartum arhati
na cāgamād ṛte dharmas tarkeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate
ṛṣīṇām api yaj jñānaṃ tad apy āgamapūrvakam
na tāṃl lokaprasiddhatvāt kaś cit tarkeṇa bādhate
nirjñātaśakter dravyasya tāṃ tām arthakriyāṃ prati
ye bhāvān vacanaṃ teṣāṃ nānumānena bādhyate
yo yasya svam iva jñānaṃ darśanaṃ nātiśaṅkate
thitaṃ pratyakṣapakṣe taṃ katham anyo nivartayet
idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ pāpam ity etasmin padadvaye
caitanyam iva yaś cāyam avicchedena vartate
āgamas tam upāsīno hetuvādair na bādhyate
tasmād akṛtakaṃ śāstraṃ smṛtiṃ ca sanibandhanām
ātmabhedaṃ tayoḥ ke cid astīty āhuḥ purāṇagāḥ
tadvac chabdo+api buddhisthaḥ śrutīnāṃ kāraṇaṃ pṛthak
vitarkitaḥ purā buddhyā kva cid arthe niveśitaḥ
nādasya kramajātatvān na pūrvo na paraś ca saḥ
ātmarūpaṃ yathā jñāne jñeyarūpaṃ ca dṛśyate
artharūpaṃ tathā śabde svarūpaṃ ca prakāśate
vṛttis tasya kriyārūpā bhāgaśo bhajate kramam
yathā prayoktuḥ prāg buddhiḥ śabdeṣv eva pravartate
vyavasāyo grahītṝṇām evaṃ teṣv eva jāyate
grāhyatvaṃ grāhakatvaṃ ca dve śaktī tejaso yathā
yo ya uccāryate śabdo niyataṃ na sa kāryabhāk
uccaran paratantratvād guṇaḥ kāryair na yujyate
tasyāpy uccāraṇe rūpam anyat tasmād vivicyate
ṣaṣṭhyāś ca prathamāyāś ca nimittatvāya kalpate
asyeti vyatirekaś ca tadarthād eva jāyate
svaṃ rūpam iti kaiś cit tu vyaktiḥ saṃjñopadiśyate
jāteḥ kāryāṇi saṃsṛṣṭā jātis tu pratipadyate
saṃjñinīṃ vyaktim icchanti sūtre grāhyām athāpare
kāryatve nityatāyāṃ vā ke cid ekatvavādinaḥ
kāryatve nityatāyāṃ vā ke cin nānātvavādinaḥ
vākyeṣu padam ekaṃ ca bhinneṣv apy upalabhyate
na varṇavyatirekeṇa padam anyac ca vidyate
vākyaṃ varṇapadābhyāṃ ca vyatiriktaṃ na kiṃ ca na
pade na varṇā vidyante varṇeṣv avayavā na ca
vākyāt padānām atyantaṃ pravibhāgo na kaś ca na
tatra yan mukhyam ekeṣāṃ tatrānyeṣāṃ viparyayaḥ
śabdasya grahaṇe hetuḥ prākṛto dhvanir iṣyate
dhvanayaḥ samupohante sphoṭātmā tair na bhidyate
cakṣuṣaḥ prāpyakāritve tejasā tu dvayor api
viṣayendriyayor iṣṭaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa kramo dhvaneḥ
kaiś cid dhvanir asaṃvedyaḥ svatantro+anyaiḥ prakalpitaḥ
āvṛttyā na tu sa granthaḥ pratyāvṛtti nirūpyate
asataś cāntarāle yāñ śabdān astīti manyate
pratipattur aśaktiḥ sā grahaṇopāya eva saḥ
yathaiva darśanaiḥ pūrvair dūrāt saṃtamase+api vā
bhāgavatsv api teṣv eva rūpabhedo dhvaneḥ kramāt
kaiś cid vyaktaya evāsyā dhvanitvena prakalpitāḥ
āśrayair api nityānāṃ jātīnāṃ vyaktir iṣyate
deśādibhiś ca saṃbandho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyavatām api
sa sphoṭaḥ śabdajāḥ śabdā dhvanayo+anyair udāhṛtāḥ
alpe mahati vā śabde sphoṭakālo na bhidyate
dūrāt prabheva dīpasya dhvanimātraṃ tu lakṣyate
ghaṇṭādīnāṃ ca śabdeṣu vyakto bhedaḥ sa dṛśyate
kampe tūparate jātā nādā vṛtter viśeṣakāḥ
kaiś cid darśanabhedo hi pravādeṣv anavasthitaḥ
sa manobhāvam āpadya tejasā pākam āgataḥ
ātmā buddhyā samarthyārthān mano yuṅkte vivakṣayā
manaḥ kāyāgnim āhanti sa prerayati mārutam]
vyajanād vāyur iva sa svanimittāt pratīyate
tasya prāṇe ca yā śaktir yā ca buddhau vyavasthitā
chandobhya eva prathamam etad viśvaṃ pravartate
sādhvī vāg bhūyasī yeṣu puruṣeṣu vyavasthitā
adhikaṃ vartate teṣu puṇyaṃ rūpaṃ prajāpateḥ
prājāpatyaṃ mahat tejas tatpātrair iva saṃvṛtam
yad etan maṇḍalaṃ bhāsvad dhāma citrasya rādhasaḥ
sthānānām abhighātaś ca na vinā śabdabhāvanām
na so+asti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamād ṛte
anuviddham iva jñānaṃ sarvaṃ śabdena bhāsate
na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī
saiṣā saṃsāriṇāṃ saṃjñā bahir antaś ca vartate
āmnātā sarvavidyāsu vāg eva prakṛtiḥ parā
te mṛtyum ativartante ye vai vācam upāsate
pravibhāge yathā kartā tayā kārye pravartate
svamātrā paramātrā vā śrutyā prakramyate yathā
tathaiva rūḍhatām eti tayā hy artho vidhīyate
api prayoktur ātmānaṃ śabdam antar avasthitam
prāhur mahāntam ṛṣabhaṃ yena sāyujyam iṣyate
tasmād yaḥ śabdasaṃskāraḥ sā siddhiḥ paramātmanaḥ
vācaḥ saṃskāram ādhāya vācaṃ jñāne niveśya ca
vibhajya bandhanāny asyāḥ kṛtvā tāṃ chinnabandhanām
na jātv akartṛkaṃ kaś cid āgamaṃ pratipadyate
astaṃ yāteṣu vādeṣu kartṛṣv anyeṣv asatsv api
jñāne svābhāvike nārthaḥ śāstraiḥ kaś ca na vidyate
dharmo jñānasya hetuś cet tasyāmnāyo nibandhanam
śabdānām eva sā śaktis tarko yaḥ puruṣāśrayaḥ
pītaṃ na gamayet svargaṃ kiṃ tat kratugataṃ nayet
yathaiṣāṃ tatra sāmarthyaṃ dharme+apy evaṃ pratīyatām
viparītaṃ ca sarvatra śakyate vaktum āgame
vaikharyā madhyamāyāś ca paśyantyāś caitad adbhutam
gaur iva prakṣaraty ekā rasam uttamaśālinī
anyā tv apreryamāṇaiva vinā prāṇena vartate
jāyate hi tataḥ prāṇo vācam āpyāyayan punaḥ
sarvasyocchvāsam āsādya na vāg vadati karhi cit
tayor api ca ghoṣiṇyā nirghoṣaiva garīyasī
puruṣe ṣoḍaśakale tām āhur amṛtāṃ kalām
śiṣṭair nibadhyamānā tu na vyavacchidyate smṛtiḥ
bhāvatattvaṃ tu vijñāya liṅgebhyo vihitā smṛtiḥ
śabdaḥ saṃskārahīno yo gaur iti prayuyukṣyate
na śiṣṭair anugamyante paryāyā iva sādhavaḥ
te yataḥ smṛtiśāstreṇa tasmāt sākṣād avācakāḥ
avyaktaṃ tadvidāṃ tena vyaktau bhavati niścayaḥ
prasiddhim āgatā yena teṣāṃ sādhur avācakaḥ
padam ādyaṃ pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ sāpekṣam ity api
vākyaṃ prati matir bhinnā bahudhā nyāyadarśinām
saṃbodhanapadaṃ yac ca tat kriyāyā viśeṣakam
brāhmaṇārtho yathā nāsti kaś cid brāhmaṇakambale
aśābdo yadi vākyārthaḥ padārtho+api tathā bhavet
evaṃ sati ca saṃbandhaḥ śabdasyārthena hīyate
teṣāṃ tu kṛtsno vākyārthaḥ pratibhedaṃ samāpyate
sa vyaktaḥ kramavāñ śabda upāṃśu yam adhīyate
nityeṣu ca kutaḥ pūrvaṃ paraṃ vā paramārthataḥ
ekasyaiva tu sā śaktir yad evam avabhāsate
ciraṃ kṣipram iti jñāne kālabhedād ṛte yathā
na nityaḥ kramamātrābhiḥ kālo bhedam ihārhati
tābhyo yā jāyate buddhir ekā sā bhāgavarjitā
adāni vākye tāny eva varṇās te ca pade yadi
bhāgānām anupaśleṣān na varṇo na padaṃ bhavet
d antaḥśabdatattvaṃ tu bhāgair ekaṃ prakāśitam
m āhur apare śabdaṃ tasya vākye tathaikatām
kaś cid eva viśiṣṭo+arthaḥ sarveṣu pratyayas tathā
upādāyāpi ye heyās tān upāyān pracakṣate
arthaṃ kathaṃ cit puruṣaḥ kaś cit saṃpratipadyate
saṃsṛṣṭā vā vibhaktā vā bhedā vākyanibandhanāḥ
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandho buddhyā prakramyate yadā
vākyārthasya tadaiko+api varṇaḥ pratyāyakaḥ kva cit
saṃbandhe sati yat tv anyad ādhikyam upajāyate
kāryānumeyaḥ saṃbandho rūpaṃ tasya na vidyate
santa eva viśeṣā ye padārtheṣu vyavasthitāḥ
te kramād anugamyante na vākyam abhidhāyakam
śabdānāṃ kramamātre ca nānyaḥ śabdo+asti vācakaḥ
kramo hi dharmaḥ kālasya tena vākyaṃ na vidyate
ye ca saṃbhavino bhedāḥ padārtheṣv avibhāvitāḥ
saṃnidhāne vyajyante na tu varṇeṣv ayaṃ kramaḥ
padākhyā vākyasaṃjñā ca śabdatvaṃ neṣyate tayoḥ
samāne+api tu śabdatve dṛṣṭaḥ saṃpratyayaḥ padāt
prativarṇaṃ tv asau nāsti padasyārtham ato viduḥ
yathā sāvayavā varṇā vinā vācyena kena cit
arthavantaḥ samuditā vākyam apy evam iṣyate
padānāṃ saṃhitā yoniḥ saṃhitā vā padāśrayā
padāmnāyaś ca yady anyaḥ saṃhitāyā nidarśakaḥ
nityas tatra kathaṃ kāryaṃ padaṃ lakṣaṇadarśanāt
sūkṣmaṃ grāhyaṃ yathānyena saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saha gṛhyate
varṇo+apy anyena varṇena saṃbaddho vācakas tathā
padasyoccāraṇād artho yathā kaś cin nirūpyate
varṇānām api sāṃnidhyāt tathā so+arthaḥ pratīyate
prāptasya yasya sāmarthyān niyamārthā punaḥ śrutiḥ
vrīhiśrutyā nivarteta na syāt pratinidhis tathā
dravyatvam aviruddhatvāt prāptyarthaḥ san na bādhate
na ca sāmānyavat sarve kriyāśabdena lakṣitāḥ
viśeṣā na hi sarveṣāṃ satāṃ śabdo+abhidhāyakaḥ
asaṃnidhau pratinidhir mā bhūn nityasya karmaṇaḥ
kāmyasya vā pravṛttasya lopa ity upapadyate
dravyābhāve pratinidhau tasya tat syāt kriyāntaram
nirjñātārthaṃ padaṃ yac ca tadarthe pratipādite
pikādi yad avijñātaṃ tat kim ity anuyujyate
aprāpto yas tu śuklādiḥ saṃnidhānena gamyate
abhinnam eva vākyaṃ tu yady abhinnārtham iṣyate
tat sarvaṃ śrutibhūtatvān na śrutyaiva virotsyate
prāsaṅgikam idaṃ kāryam idaṃ tantreṇa labhyate
ūho+asmin viṣaye nyāyyaḥ saṃbandho+asya na bādhyat
arthitvam atra sāmarthyam asminn artho na bhidyate
iyaṃ śrutyā kramaprāptir iyam uccāraṇād iti
kramo+ayam atra balavān asmiṃs tu na vivakṣitaḥ
idaṃ pradhānaṃ śeṣo+ayaṃ viniyogakramas tv ayam
idaṃ gauṇam idaṃ mukhyaṃ vyāpīdaṃ guru laghv idam
te sarve na prakalperan padaṃ cet syād avācakam
aprasiddhaṃ tu yaṃ bhāgam adṛṣṭam anupaśyati
ekasya bhāge sādṛśyaṃ bhāge bhedaś ca lakṣyate
śāstre pratyāyakasyāpi kva cid ekatvam āśritam
pratyāyyena kva cid bhedo grahaṇagrāhyayoḥ sthitaḥ
ū ity abhedam āśritya yathāsaṃkhyaṃ prakalpitam
lṛluṭor grahaṇe bhedo grāhyābhyāṃ saha kalpitaḥ
yasyety etad aṇo rūpaṃ saṃjñinām abhidhāyakam
ū ity etad abhinnaṃ ca bhinnavākyanibandhanam
bhedena grahaṇaṃ yasya pararūpam iva dvayoḥ
vyudasyatā punar bhedaḥ śabdeṣv atyantam āśritaḥ
ātmatyāgād ṛte bhinnaṃ grahaṇaṃ sa kramaḥ śrutau
ṛco vā gītimātraṃ vā sāma dravyāntaraṃ na tu
gītibhedāt tu gṛhyante tā eva vikṛtā ṛcaḥ
tantreṇoccāraṇaṃ kāryam anyathā te na sādhavaḥ
yathā tathaiva tantrāt syād bahūnām ekarūpatā
yasya tasya na saṃbandho vākyānām upapadyate
anāgamaś ca so+abhyāsaḥ samayaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
anantaram idaṃ kāryam asmād ity upadarśakaḥ
na sa śabdasya viṣayaḥ sa hi yatnāntarāśrayaḥ
ke cid bhedāḥ prakāśyante śabdais tadabhidhāyibhiḥ
anuniṣpādinaḥ kāṃś cic chabdārthān iti manyate
jāteḥ pratyāyake śabde yā vyaktir anuṣaṅgiṇī
kriyā vinā prayogeṇa na dṛṣṭā śabdacoditā
prayogas tv anuniṣpādī śabdārtha iti gamyate
niyatās tu prayogā ye niyataṃ yac ca sādhanam
asatyo vāpi saṃsargaḥ śabdārthaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
asatyopādhi yat satyaṃ tad vā śabdanibandhanām
śabdo vāpy abhijalpatvam āgato yāti vācyataṃ
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād rūpam ekīkṛtaṃ yadā
kiṃ cid eva kva cid rūpaṃ prādhānyenāvatiṣṭhate
aśakteḥ sarvaśakter vā śabdair eva prakalpitā
sa bāhyaṃ vastv iti jñātaḥ śabdārtha iti gamyate
asminn api dṛśye+arthe darśanaṃ bhidyate pṛthak
kālāntareṇa caiko+api taṃ paśyaty anyathā punaḥ
ṛṣīṇāṃ darśanaṃ yac ca tattve kiṃ cid avasthitam
na tena vyavahāro+asti na tac chabdanibandhanam
talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva
naiva cāsti talaṃ vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ
tasmāt pratyakṣam apy arthaṃ vidvān īkṣeta yuktitaḥ
na darśanasya prāmāṇyād dṛśyam arthaṃ prakalpayet
vyavahāre samākhyānaṃ tat prajño na vikalpayet
vākyārtha iti tām āhuḥ ē̃ padārthair upapāditām
idaṃ tad iti sānyeṣām anākhyeyā kathaṃ ca na
pratyātmavṛtti siddhā sā kartrāpi na nirūpyate
itikartavyatāyāṃ tāṃ na kaś cid ativartate
gośabdo na tv asau teṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ prakāśakaḥ
śabdaḥ pravartamāno+api na tān aṅgīkaroty asau
kaiś cit tv avayavair dṛṣṭair arthaḥ kṛtsno+anumīyate
bindau ca samudāye ca vācakaḥ salilādiṣu
yāṃs tu saṃbhavino dharmān antarṇīya prayujyate
śabdas teṣāṃ na sāṃnidhyaṃ niyamena vyapekṣate
gośabdo na tathā jāter viprayoge pravartate
vācikā dyotikā vā syur dvitvādīnāṃ vibhaktayaḥ
arthān svarūpabhedena kāṃś cid āhur gavādayaḥ
niyamas tatra na tv evaṃ niyamo nuṭśabādiṣu
bahūnāṃ saṃbhave+arthānāṃ nimittaṃ kiṃ cid iṣyate
kaiś cit kathaṃ cid ākhyātā nimittāvadhisaṃkaraiḥ
kaiś cin nirvacanaṃ bhinnaṃ girater garjater gameḥ
gavater gadater vāpi gaur ity atrānudarśitam
gaur ity eva svarūpād vā gośabdo goṣu vartate
vyutpādyate na vā sarvaṃ kaiś cic cobhayatheṣyate
arthāntare ca yad vṛttaṃ tat prakṛtyantaraṃ viduḥ
tulyarūpaṃ na tad rūḍhāv anyasminn anuṣajyate
kaiś cit kathaṃ cid uddiṣṭau citraṃ hi pratipādanam
bhedābhedābhyupagame na virodho+asti kaś ca na
dhātūpasargayoḥ śāstre dhātur eva tu tādṛśaḥ
tathā hi saṃgrāmayateḥ sopasargād vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
sādhanair yāti saṃbandhaṃ tathābhūtaiva sā kriyā
dhātutvaṃ karmabhāvaś ca tathānyad api dṛśyatām
kva cit saṃbhavino bhedāḥ kevalair anidarśitāḥ
sa vācako viśeṣāṇāṃ saṃbhavād dyotako+api vā
sthādibhiḥ kevalair yac ca gamanādi na gamyate
āgamā iva ke cit tu saṃbhūyārthasya sādhakāḥ
upariṣṭāt purastād vā dyotakatvaṃ na bhidyate
cādayo na prayujyante padatve sati kevalāḥ
guṇaiḥ padānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ paratantrās tu cādayaḥ
janayitvā kriyā kā cit saṃbandhaṃ vinivartate
śrūyamāṇe kriyāśabde saṃbandho jāyate kva cit
yujyate vir yathā tasya likhāv anupasargatā
tiṣṭhater aprayogaś ca dṛṣṭo+apraty ajayann iti
sunv abhīty ābhimukhye ca kevalo+api prayujyate
kriyāyā dyotako nāyaṃ na saṃbandhasya vācakaḥ
varṇānāṃ padam arthena yuktaṃ nāvayavāḥ pade
ke cid dhi yutasiddhārthā bhede nirjñātaśaktayaḥ
ātvādīnāṃ hi śuddhānāṃ laukiko+artho na vidyate
prāg vibhaktes tadantasya tathaivārtho na vidyate
ātmabhedo na cet kaś cid varṇebhyaḥ padavākyayoḥ
varṇena kena cin nyūnaḥ saṃghāto yo +abhidhāyakaḥ
na cec chabdāntaram asāv anyūnas tena gamyate
sa tasmin vācake śabde nimittāt smṛtim ādadhat
padavācyo yathā nārthaḥ kaś cid gaurakharādiṣu
saty api pratyaye+atyantaṃ samudāye na gamyate
gargā ity eka evāyaṃ bahuṣv artheṣu vartate
yathā ca khadiracchede bhāgeṣu kramavāṃś chidiḥ
prādhānyaṃ bahudhā bhāṣye doṣās tu prakriyāgatāḥ
yam artham āhatur bhinnau pratyayāv eka eva ta
kva cid āha pacantīti dhātus tābhyāṃ vinā kva cit
yathābhyāsaṃ hi vāg arthe pratipattiṃ samīhate
samārambhāc ca bhāvānām ādimad brahma śāśvatam
asatye vartmani sthitvā tataḥ satyaṃ samīhate
punar vākye tam evārtham anyathā pratipadyate
upāttā bahavo+apy arthā yeṣv ante pratiṣedhanam
kriyate te nivartante tasmāt tāṃs tatra nāśrayet
nārthe na buddhau saṃbandho nivṛtter avatiṣṭhate
aśabdavācyā sā buddhir nivartyeta sthitā katham
atha yaj jñānam utpannaṃ tan mithyeti nañā kṛtam
athādhāraḥ sa evāsya niyamārthā śrutir bhavet
kaś cid evārthavāṃs tatra śabdaḥ śeṣās tv anarthakāḥ
pūrvaṃ padeṣv asaṃsṛṣṭo yaḥ kramād upacīyate
ekam āhur anekārthaṃ śabdam anye parīkṣakāḥ
tathā sa eva gośabdo vāhīke+api vyavasthitaḥ
gotvānuṣaṅgo vāhīke nimittāt kaiś cid iṣyate
arthamātraṃ viparyastaṃ svarūpe tu śrutiḥ sthitā
mantrāś ca viniyogena labhante bhedam ūhavat
tāny āmnāyāntarāṇy eva paṭhyate kiṃ cid eva tu
anarthakānāṃ pāṭho vā śeṣas tv anyaḥ pratīyate
anyā japaprabandheṣu sā tv ekaiva pratīyate
yuktaḥ pratyāyayaty arthaṃ taṃ gauṇam apare viduḥ
yas tv anyasya prayogeṇa yatnād iva niyujyate
nimittaṃ tatra mukhyaṃ syān nimitti gauṇa iṣyate
purārād iti bhinne+arthe yau vartete virodhini
yac cāpy ekaṃ padaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ caritāstikriyaṃ kva cit
tad vākyāntaram evāhur na tad anyena yujyate
yac ca ko+ayam iti praśne gaur aśva iti cocyate
praśna eva kriyā tatra prakrāntā darśanādikā
ādhikyam api manyante prasiddher nyūnatāṃ kva cit
saṃbandhisadṛśād dharmāt taṃ gauṇam apare viduḥ
manyante sa gavādis tu gauṇa ity ucyate kva cit
kriyāntare na caiteṣāṃ vibhavanti na śaktayaḥ
rūpād eva tu tādarthyaṃ niyamena pratīyate
taṃ mukhyam arthaṃ manyante gauṇaṃ yatnopapāditam
agnidattas tu yo+agniḥ syāt tatra svārthopasarjanaḥ
na sarvaḥ pratyayas tasmin prasiddha iva jāyate
bhedāt tu sparśanādīnāṃ na jalaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikā
yas tasmāl lakṣyate bhedas tam asatyaṃ pracakṣate
yac ca nimnonnataṃ citre sarūpaṃ parvatādibhiḥ
na tatra pratighātādi kāryaṃ tadvat pravartate
na tathālātacakrasya vicchinnaṃ spṛśyate hi tat
nagareṣu na te tadvad gandharvanagareṣv api
tāvān na mṛnmayeṣv asti tasmāt te viṣayaḥ kanaḥ
na te svapnādiṣu svasya tadvad arthasya sādhakāḥ
yathā prasiddhir lokasya tathā tad avasīyate
yac copaghātajaṃ jñānaṃ yac ca jñānam alaukikam
tasmāt prayojakād anyān api pratyāyayaty asau
tathā śabdo+api kasmiṃś cit pratyāyye+arthe vivakṣite
tathā śabdo+api saṃbandhī pravivektuṃ na śakyate
kva cit sāṃnidhyam apy eṣāṃ pratipattāv akāraṇam
yac cānupāttaṃ śabdena tat kasmiṃś cit pratīyate
kva cit pradhānam evārtho bhavaty anyasya lakṣaṇa
ākhyātaṃ taddhitārthasya yat kiṃ cid upadarśakam
hrasvasyārdhaṃ ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tasyāsaṃnidhāv api
dīrghaplutābhyāṃ tasya syān mātrayā vā viśeṣaṇam
jāter vā lakṣaṇāya syāt sarvathā saptaparṇavat
gantavyaṃ dṛśyatāṃ sūrya iti kālasya lakṣaṇe
jñāyatāṃ kāla ity etat sopāyam abhidhīyate
sāmānyam āśrayaḥ śakter yaḥ kaś cit pratipādakaḥ
kākebhyo rakṣyatāṃ sarpir iti bālo+api coditaḥ
upaghātapare vākye na śvādibhyo na rakṣati
śabdārthāḥ pravibhajyante na rūpād eva kevalāt
sāmarthyam aucitī deśaḥ kālo vyaktiḥ svarādayaḥ
śabdā vākyasya teṣv artho na rūpād adhigamyate
stūyate sā stutis tasya kartur eva prayojikā
śāstreṇa pratiṣiddhe+arthe vidvān kaś cit pravartate
nānyathā pratipattavyaṃ na dato gamayed iti
tatrāpi ca pravṛttiś ca nivṛttiś copadiśyate
sāpekṣā ye tu vākyārthāḥ padārthair eva te samāḥ
vākyaṃ tad api manyante yat padaṃ caritakriyam
tad apy ekaṃ samāptārthaṃ vākyam ity abhidhīya
apare tu padasyaiva tam arthaṃ pratijānate
yasminn uccarite śabde yadā yo+arthaḥ pratīyate
tam āhur arthaṃ tasyaiva nānyad arthasya lakṣaṇam
tāni śabdāntarāṇy eva paryāyā iva laukikāḥ
pratibodhābhyupāyās tu ye taṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ prati
asatyāṃ pratipattau vā mithyā vā pratipādane
svair arthair nityasaṃbandhās te te śabdā vyavasthitāḥ
yathāprakaraṇaṃ dvāram ity asyāṃ karmaṇaḥ śrutau
badhāna dehi vety etad upāyād avagamyate
arthas tu tasya saṃbandhī prakalpayati saṃnidhim
nārthāc chabdasya sāṃnidhyaṃ na śabdād arthasaṃnidhiḥ
na cāpi rūpāt saṃdehe vācakatvaṃ nivartate
ardhaṃ paśor iti yathā sāmarthyāt tad dhi kalpate
saṃsarge ca vibhakto+asya tasyārtho na pṛthag yadi
vākyasya buddhau nityatvam arthayogaṃ ca laukikam
vyāptimāṃś ca laghuś caiva vyavahāraḥ padāśrayaḥ
loke śāstre ca kāryārthaṃ vibhāgenaiva kalpitaḥ
tasmād alaukiko vākyād anyaḥ kaś cin na vidyate
anyatra śrūyamāṇaiś ca liṅgair vākyaiś ca sūcitāḥ
utsargavākye yat tyaktam aśabdam iva śabdavat
tad bādhakeṣu vākyeṣu śrutam anyatra gamyate
brāhmaṇānāṃ śrutir dadhni prakrāntā māṭharād vinā
ekam eveṣyate kaiś cid bhinnarūpam iva sthitam
niyamaḥ pratiṣedhaś ca vidhiśeṣas tathā sati
dvitīye yo lug ākhyātas taccheṣam alukaṃ viduḥ
saṃjñāśabdaikadeśo yas tasya lopo na vidyate
viśiṣṭarūpā sā saṃjñā kṛtā ca na nivartate
saṃjñāntarāc ca dattāder nānyā saṃjñā pratīyate
varṇānām arthavattvaṃ tu saṃjñānāṃ saṃjñibhir bhavet
ekadeśāt tu saṃghāte keṣāṃ cij jāyate smṛtiḥ
smṛtes tu viṣayāc chabdāt saṃghātārthaḥ pratīyate
ekadeśāt smṛtir bhinne saṃghāte niyatā katham
ekadeśasarūpās tu tais tair bhedaiḥ samanvitāḥ
teṣāṃ ye sādhavas teṣu śāstre lopādi śiṣyate
na hy anvākhyāyake śāstre teṣu dattādivat smṛtiḥ
kṛtaṇatvāś ca ye śabdā nityāḥ kharaṇasādayaḥ
gotrāṇy eva tu tāny āhuḥ saṃjñāśaktisamanvayāt
vyavahārāya niyamaḥ saṃjñānāṃ saṃjñini kva cit
nitya eva tu saṃbandho ḍitthādiṣu gavādivat
saṃjñāyāṃ sā hi puruṣair yathākāmaṃ niyujyate
saṃjñāḥ kriyante sarvāsu saṃjñāsv eṣaiva kalpanā
saṃjñā svarūpam āśritya nimitte sati laukikī
kā cit pravartate kā cin nimittāsaṃnidhāv api
āvṛtter anumānaṃ vā sārūpyāt tatra gamyate
viṣayaṃ kṛtrimasyāpi laukikaḥ kva cid uccaran
vyāpnoti dūrāt saṃbuddhau tathā hi grahaṇaṃ dvayoḥ
anyathā hi vyavasthāne na tadarthaḥ prakalpate
pratyekaṃ pratipadyante na tu nāṭyakriyām iva
bhujiḥ karoti bhujyarthaṃ na tantreṇa pradīpavat
lakṣaṇārthā śrutir yeṣāṃ kāṃ cid eva kriyāṃ prati
tair vyastaiś ca samastaiś ca sa dharma upalakṣyate
vṛṣalair na praveṣṭavyam ity etasmin gṛhe yathā
pratyekaṃ vā samastair vā ṇatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate
svaṃ svaṃ bhojyaṃ vibhāgena prāptaṃ saṃbhūya bhuñjate
vākyāntarāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ samāptiḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
teṣāṃ tadānīṃ bhinnasya kiṃ padārthasya sattayā
atha tair eva janitaḥ so+artho bhinneṣu vartate
pūrvasyārthasya tena syād virodhaḥ saha vā sthitiḥ
yathā sādhāraṇe svatvaṃ tyāgasya ca phalaṃ dhane
nārthavattā pade varṇe vākye caivaṃ viśiṣyate
abhyāsāt prakramo+anyas tu viruddha iva dṛśyate
viniyogād ṛte śabdo na svārthasya prakāśakaḥ
āmnāyaśabdān abhyāse ke cid āhur anarthakān
prayogād abhisaṃdhānam anyad eṣu na vidyate
viṣaye yataśaktitvāt sa tu tatra vyavasthitaḥ
na jātv arthāntare vṛttir anyārthānāṃ kathaṃ ca na
kāmaṃ vimarśas tatrāyaṃ na vākyāvayave pade
pūrvair arthair anugato yathārthātmā paraḥ paraḥ
aṅgīkṛte tu keṣāṃ cit sādhyenārthena sādhane
sāmarthyāt saṃbhavas tasya śrutis tv anyanivṛttaye
prakāśate tadanyeṣāṃ vākyaṃ vākyārtha eva ca
svarūpaṃ vidyate yasya tasyātmā na nirūpyate
nāsti yasya svarūpaṃ tu tasyaivātmā nirūpyate
indriyāṇāṃ yathā kāryam ṛte dehān na kalpate
darśanasyāpi yat satyaṃ na tathā darśanaṃ sthitam
satyo vā viparīto vā vyavahāre na so+asty ataḥ
sad ity etat tu yad vākyaṃ tad abhūd asti neti vā
prādhānyāt tu kriyā pūrvam arthasya pravibhajyate
āśliṣṭo yo+anupaśliṣṭaḥ sa kadā cit pratīyate
na svaśaktiḥ padārthānāṃ saṃspraṣṭuṃ tena śakyate
lakṣaṇād vyavatiṣṭhante padārthā na tu vastutaḥ
upakārāt sa evārthaḥ kathaṃ cid anugamyate
vākyārtho yo+abhisaṃbandho na tasyātmā kva cit sthitaḥ
padārthe samudāye vā samāpto naiva vā kva cit
saṃpratyayārthād bāhyo+arthaḥ sann asan vā vibhajyate
anyatra ca tato rūpaṃ na tāsām upalabhyate
ekatiṅ yasya vākyaṃ tu śāstre niyatalakṣaṇam
mṛgaḥ paśyata yātīti bhedābhedau na tiṣṭhataḥ
brāhmaṇā iti nākhyāta- rūpād bhedaḥ pratīyate
sakṛc chrutā saptadaśasv anāvṛttāpi yā kriyā
uccāraṇe tu vākyānām anyad rūpaṃ na gṛhyate
pratipattau tu bhinnānām anyad rūpaṃ pratīyate
kartarīti yathā tac ca paśvādiṣu vibhajyate
yady ākāṅkṣā nivarteta tadbhūtasya sakṛc chrutau
naivānyenābhisaṃbandhaṃ tad upeyāt kathaṃ ca na
kva cit kriyā vyaktibhāgair upakāre pravartate
sāmānyabhāga evāsyāḥ kva cid arthasya sādhakaḥ
kālabhinnāś ca ye bhedā ye cāpy uṣṭrāsikādiṣu
prakrame jātibhāgasya śabdātmā tair na bhidyate
eṣāṃ kramo vibhaktānāṃ tannibaddhā sakṛc chrutiḥ
dvāv apy upāyau śabdānāṃ prayoge samavasthitau
kramo vā yaugapadyaṃ vā yau loko nātivartate
krame vibhajyate rūpaṃ yaugapadye na bhidyate
bhedasaṃsargaśaktī dve śabdād bhinne iva sthite
bhedanirvacane tv asya pratyekaṃ vā samāpyate
dviṣṭhāni yāni vākyāni teṣv apy ekatvadarśinām
anekā śaktir ekasya yugapac chrūyate kva cit
liṅgād vā tantradharmād vā vibhāgo vyavatiṣṭhate
pravibhāgas tathā sūtra ekasminn eva jāyate
nyāyaprasthānamārgāṃs tān abhyasya svaṃ ca darśanam
vartmanām atra keṣāṃ cid vastumātram udāhṛtam
kiyad vā śakyam unnetuṃ svatarkam anudhāvatā
tat tad utprekṣamāṇānāṃ purāṇair āgamair vinā
dvidhā kaiś cit padaṃ bhinnaṃ caturdhā pañcadhāpi vā
padārthānām apoddhāre jātir vā dravyam eva vā
saṃśleṣamātraṃ badhnātir yadi syāt tu vivakṣitaḥ
yathā rakte guṇe tattvaṃ kaṣāye vyapadiśyate
jātau padārthe jātir vā viseṣo vāpi jātivat
śabdair apekṣyate yasmād atas te jātivācinaḥ
dravyadharmā padārthe tu dravye sarvo+artha ucyate
anupravṛttirūpā yā prakhyā tām ākṛtiṃ viduḥ
ke cid vyāvṛttirūpāṃ tu dravyatvena pracakṣate
bhinnā iti paropādhir abhinnā iti vā punaḥ
naikatvaṃ nāpi nānātvaṃ na sattvaṃ na ca nāstitā
saṃsṛṣṭāḥ puruṣārthasya sādhikā na tu kevalāḥ
na tad utpadyate kiṃ cid yasya jātir na vidyate
kva cit kāryeṣv abhivyaktim upayānti punaḥ punaḥ
nirvartyamānaṃ yat karma jātis tatrāpi sādhanam
vidhau vā pratiṣedhe vā brāhmaṇatvādi sādhanam
satyāsatyau tu yau bhāgau pratibhāvaṃ vyavasthitau
satyaṃ yat tatra sā jātir asatyā vyaktayaḥ smṛtāḥ
jātir ity ucyate tasyāṃ sarve śabdā vyavasthitāḥ
tāṃ prātipadikārthaṃ ca dhātvarthaṃ ca pracakṣate
sā nityā sā mahān ātmā tām āhus tvatalādayaḥ
kramarūpasya saṃhāre tat sattvam iti kathyate
pūrvasmāt pracyutā dharmād aprāptā cottaraṃ padam
āśrayaḥ svātmamātrā vā bhāvā vā vyatirekiṇaḥ
abhivyaktāḥ svakāryāṇāṃ sādhakā ity api smṛtiḥ
citrādiṣv apy abhivyaktir jātīnāṃ kaiś cid iṣyate
prāṇyāśritās tu tāḥ prāptau nimittaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ
jñānaṃ tv asmadviśiṣṭānāṃ tāsu sarvendriyaṃ viduḥ
na vinā saṃkhyayā kaś cit sattvabhūto+artha ucyate
ataḥ sarvasya nirdeśe saṃkhyā syād avivakṣitā
ekatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā keṣāṃ cid avivakṣitam
tad dhi jātyabhidhānāya dvitvaṃ tu syād vivakṣitam
yady etau vyādhitau syātāṃ deyaṃ syād idam auṣadham
ity evaṃ lakṣaṇe+arthasya dvitvaṃ syād avivakṣitam
saṃkhyāyāḥ khanati dvābhyām iti rūpād dhi sāśritā
liṅgāt tu syād dvitīyādes tad ekatvaṃ vivakṣitam
kriyāyām aṅgabhāvaś ca tat tv etasmād vivakṣitam
grahās tv anyatra vihitā bhinnasaṃkhyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
aṅgatvena pratītānāṃ saṃmārge tv aṅgināṃ punaḥ
nirdeśaṃ prati yā saṃkhyā sā kathaṃ syād vivakṣitā
nānyatra vidhir astīti saṃskāro nāpi cāṅgitā
hetuḥ saṃkhyāvivakṣāyā yatnāt sā hi vivakṣitā
saṃmārjane viśeṣaś ca na grahe kva cid āśritaḥ
vihītās te ca saṃskāryāḥ sarveṣām āśrayas tataḥ
pratyāśrayaṃ samāptāyāṃ jātāv ekena cet kriyā
paśunā na prakalpeta tat syād eva prakalpanam
ekena ca prasiddhāyāṃ kriyāyāṃ yadi saṃbhavāt
ke cid icchanti na tv atra saṃkhyāṅgatvena gṛhyate
dvitīyādi tu yal liṅgam uktanyāyānuvādi tat
yuktaṃ yat sādhanatvaṃ syān na tv anyārthopalakṣaṇam
vidhivākye śrutā saṃkhyā lakṣaṇāyāṃ na bādhyate
kaś cid eva guṇo dravye yathā sāmarthyalakṣaṇaḥ
tayos tu pṛthagarthitve saṃbandho yaḥ pratīyate
na tasminn upaghāto+asti kalpyam anyan na cāśrutam
yadā tu jātiḥ śaktir vā kriyāṃ praty upadiśyate
jātīnāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca tulye+aṅgatve kriyāṃ prati
vyaktiśakteḥ samāsannā jātayo na tathā guṇāḥ
sākṣād dravyaṃ kriyāyogi guṇas tasmād vikalpate
atadguṇo+ataś chāgaḥ syān meṣo vā tadguṇo bhavet
saṃkhyāviśeṣam utsṛjya kva cit saiva pravartate
svārthaṃ pravartamānaṃ tu na saṃkhyām avalambate
yāvatāṃ saṃbhavo yasya sa kuryāt tāvatāṃ yadi
ālambhanaṃ guṇais tena pradhānaṃ syāt prayojitam
saṃkhyā kartā tathā karmaṇy aviśiṣṭaḥ pratīyate
na tasmād eva sāmarthyāt sa daṇḍīti pratīyate
tasmāt saty api sāmarthye buddhir arthāntarāśrayā
sarvasyānte yatas tasmād vyavahāro na kalpate
yadā bhedān parityajya buddhyaika iva gṛhyate
vyaktyātmaiva tadā tatra buddhir ekā pravartate
jñāneṣv api yathārtheṣu tathā sarveṣu jātayaḥ
na jātu jñeyavaj jñānaṃ pararūpeṇa rūpyate
ayaugapadye jñānānām asyety agrahaṇaṃ na ca
ghaṭa ity api yaj jñānaṃ viṣayopanipāti tat
ātmā vastu svabhāvaś ca śarīraṃ tattvam ity api
dravyam ity asya paryāyās tac ca nityam iti smṛtam
suvarṇādi yathā yuktaṃ svair ākārair apāyibhiḥ
teṣv ākāreṣu yaḥ śabdas tathābhūteṣu vartate
na tattvātattvayor bheda iti vṛddhebhya āgamaḥ
na cātra kālabhedo+asti kālabhedaś ca gṛhyate
tadātmeva ca tat siddham atyantam atadātmakam
tadātmeva ca tat tattvam atyantam atadātmakam
sat yam ākṛtisaṃhāre yad ante vyavatiṣṭhate
tan nityaṃ śabdavācyaṃ tac chabdāt tac ca na bhidyate
na tad asti na tan nāsti na tad ekaṃ na tat pṛthak
na saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vibhaktaṃ na vikṛtaṃ na na cānyathā
tan nāsti vidyate tac ca tad ekaṃ tat pṛthak pṛthak
saṃsṛṣṭaṃ ca vibhaktaṃ ca vikṛtaṃ tat tad anyathā
tad dṛśyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā darśane ca prayojanam
vācyā sā sarvaśabdānāṃ śabdāś ca na pṛthak tataḥ
apṛthaktve ca saṃbandhas tayor nānātmanor iva
ātmā paraḥ priyo dveṣyo vaktā vācyaṃ prayojanam
jñānaṃ prayoktur bāhyo+arthaḥ svarūpaṃ ca pratīyate
pratipattur bhavaty arthe jñāne vā saṃśayaḥ kva cit
asyāyaṃ vācako vācya iti ṣaṣṭhyā pratīyate
yogaḥ śabdārthayos tattvam apy ato vyapadiśyate
śaktīnām api sā śaktir guṇānām apy asau guṇaḥ
kā cid eva hi sāvasthā kāryaprasavasūcitā
kasya cit kena cid yasyāṃ saṃyoga upajāyate
nirātmakānām utpattau niyamaḥ kva cid eva yaḥ
saṃbandhas tena śabdārthaḥ pravibhaktuṃ na śakyate
samavāyāt sva ādhāraḥ svā ca jātiḥ pratīyate
ekārthasamavāyāt tu guṇāḥ svādhāra eva ye
tatpradeśavibhāgāś ca guṇā dvitvādayaś ca ye
ke cit svāśrayasaṃyuktāḥ ke cit tatsamavāyinaḥ
svāśrayeṇa tu saṃyuktaiḥ saṃyuktaṃ vibhu gamyate
prayoktā pratipattā vā na śabdair anugacchati
avācyam iti yad vācyaṃ tad avācyatayā yadā
vācyam ity avasīyeta vācyam eva tadā bhavet
athāpy avācyam ity evaṃ na tad vācyaṃ pratīyate
tatrāpi naiva sāvasthā taiḥ śabdaiḥ pratiṣidhyate
sarvaṃ mithyā bravīmīti naitad vākyaṃ vivakṣyate
tasya mithyābhidhāne hi prakrānto+artho na gamyate
pratipādyaṃ na tat tatra yenānyat pratipadyate
yathā tathāsya dharmo+api nātra kaś cit pratīyate
vyāpārasyāparo yasmān na vyāpāro+asti kaś ca na
virodham anavasthāṃ vā tasmāt sarvatra nāśrayet
anādir arthaiḥ śabdānāṃ saṃbandho yogyatā tathā
asādhur anumānena vācakaḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
śabdaḥ kāraṇam arthasya sa hi tenopajanyate
tathā ca buddhiviṣayād arthāc chabdaḥ pratīyate
bhojanādy api manyante buddhyarthe yad asaṃbhavi
buddhyarthād eva buddhyarthe jāte tad api dṛśyate
anityatvaṃ svaśaktir vā sā ca nityān na bhidyate
dṛśyate na ca saṃbandhas tathābhūto vivakṣitaḥ
nitye+anitye+api vāpy arthe puruṣeṇa kathaṃ ca na
tadvac chabdo+api sattāyām asyaṃ pūrvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ
ātmalābhasya janmākhyā satā labhyaṃ ca labhyate
yadi saj jāyate kasmād athāsaj jāyate katham
sato hi gantur gamanaṃ sati gamye pravartate
gantṛvac cen na janmārtho na cet tadvan na jāyate
punaś ca karmabhāvena tāṃ kriyāṃ ca tadāśrayām
janmanā tu virodhitvān mukhyā sattā na vidyate
antarbhāvāc ca tenāsau karmaṇā na sakarmakaḥ
prāk ca sattābhisaṃbandhān mukhyā sattā kathaṃ bhavet
asaṃś ca nāsteḥ kartā syād upacāras tu pūrvavat
etāṃ sattāṃ padārtho hi na kaś cid ativartate
sā ca saṃpratisattāyāḥ pṛthag bhāṣye nidarśitā
jñānaṃ praty abhilāpaṃ ca sadṛśau bālapaṇḍitau
tato+apy asya parāṃ śuddhim eke prāhur arūpikām
kāluṣyam iva tat tasya saṃsarge vyatibhedajam
yathā ca jñānam ālekhād aśuddhau vyavatiṣṭhate
evam arthasya śabdasya jñānasya ca viparyaye
sopākhyasya tu bhāvasya kāraṇaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati
tasmāt sarvam abhāvo vā bhāvo vā sarvam iṣyate
na tv avasthāntaraṃ kiṃ cid ekasmāt satyataḥ sthitam
tasmān nābhāvam icchanti ye loke bhāvavādinaḥ
avirodhī virodhī vā sann asan vāpi yuktitaḥ
avirodhī virodhī vā sann asan vāpi tattvataḥ
kramavān akramo vāpi tena bhāvo na vidyate
abhāve triṣu kāleṣu na bhedasyāsti saṃbhavaḥ
ātmatattvaṃ tu parataḥ svato vā nopakalpate
tattve virodho nānātva upakāro na kaś ca na
yatra draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṃ ca darśanaṃ cāvikalpitam
sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā yasmād āhur viśeṣavat
śabdās tasmād asatyeṣu bhedeṣv eva vyavasthitāḥ
na hy abhāvasya sadbhāve bhāvasyātmā prahīyate
abhāvo yadi vastu syāt tatreyaṃ syād vicāraṇā
tataś ca tadabhāve+api syād vicāryam idaṃ punaḥ
avastu syād atitaṃ yad vyavahārasya gocaraḥ
tatra vastugato bhedo na nirvacanam arhati
atha ca prāgasadbhāvaḥ kāraṇe sati dṛśyate
kā tasya prāgavastheti vastvāśritam idaṃ punaḥ
prāg avastheti na hy etad dvayam apy asty avastuni
alaṃ syād apadasthānam etad vācaḥ pracakṣate
atyadbhutā tv iyaṃ vṛttir yad abhāgaṃ yad akramam
bhāvam eva kramaṃ prāhur na bhāvād aparaḥ kramaḥ
kramān na yaugapadyasya kaś cid bhedo+asti tattvataḥ
yathaiva bhāvān nābhāvaḥ kaś cid anyo+avasīyate
kālasyāpy aparaṃ kālaṃ nirdiśanty eva laukikāḥ
avastuṣv api notprekṣā kasya cit pratibadhyate
ke cit padārthā vakṣyante saṃkṣepeṇa yathāgamam
dravyam ity ucyate so+artho bhedyatvena vivakṣitaḥ
saṃsargi bhedakaṃ yad yat savyāpāraṃ pratīyate
nāpekṣate nimittaṃ ca prakarṣe vyāpṛtaṃ yadi
dravyasya syād upādānaṃ prakarṣaṃ praty anarthakam
dik sādhanaṃ kriyā kāla iti vastvabhidhāyinaḥ
ṛjv ity evaṃ yato+anyena vinā buddhiḥ pravartate
sā svair upādhibhir bhinnā śaktir dig iti kathyate
tata eva prakalpete kramarūpe tu kālataḥ
ākāśasya pradeśena bhāgaiś cānyaiḥ pṛthak pṛthak
diśo vyavasthā deśānāṃ digvyavasthā na vidyate
pūrvabuddhir yato dik sā samākhyāmātram anyathā
svāṅgād vyavasthā yā loke na tasyāṃ niyatā diśaḥ
pratyaṅmukhasya yat paścāt tat purastād viparyaye
rūḍham apy aparatvena pūrvam ity abhidhīyate
asminn arthe na śabdena prasavaḥ kva cid ucyate
dikśakter abhidhāne tu niyataṃ diśi darśanam
adeśāś cāpy abhāgāś ca niṣkramā nirupāśrayāḥ
bhāgaḥ śaktyantaraṃ tatra parimāṇaṃ ca yat tayoḥ
yataḥ prakalpate bhedo bhedas tatrāpi dṛśyate
sarvatra tasya kāryasya darśanād vibhur iṣyate
vibhutvam etad evāhur anyaḥ kāyavatāṃ vidhiḥ
prakṛtiṃ prāṇināṃ tāṃ hi ko+anyathā sthāpayiṣyati
tasmāt tyajann imān bhāvān punar evāvalambate
tasyās tu śakteḥ pūrvādi- bhedo bhāvāntarāśrayaḥ
pūrvam as yeti ṣaṣṭhy eva dṛṣṭā dharmāntarāśraye
ṛjv etad asyety etac ca liṅgaṃ na vyatikīryate
asyāṃ tv antarbahirbhāvaḥ prakriyāyāṃ na vidyate
ekatvam āsāṃ śaktīnāṃ nānātvaṃ veti kalpane
paramārthe tayor eṣa bhedo+atyantaṃ na vidyate
na śaktīnāṃ tathā bhedo yathā śaktimatāṃ sthitiḥ
na ca laukikam ekatvaṃ tāsām ātmasu vidyate
naikatvaṃ vyavatiṣṭheta nānātvaṃ cen na kalpayet
nānātvaṃ cāvahīyeta yady ekatvaṃ na kalpayet
sarvadā sarvathā bhāvāt kva cit kiṃ cid vivakṣyate
sann asan vārtharūpeṣu bhedo buddhyā prakalpyate
yad yadā yadanugrāhi tat tadā tatra sādhanam
natir āvarjanety evaṃ siddhaḥ sādhanam iṣyate
sa tebhyo vyatirikto vā teṣām ātmaiva vā tathā
pūrvasmin yā kriyā saiva parasmin sādhanaṃ matā
saṃdarśane tu caitanyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ viduḥ
putrasya janmani yathā pitroḥ kartṛtvam ucyate
ayam asyām iyaṃ tv asmād iti bhedo vivakṣayā
nyaktāyām api saṃpūrṇaiḥ svair vyāpāraiḥ samanvitāḥ
svātantryam uttaraṃ labdhvā pradhāne yānti kartṛtām
yathā rājñā niyukteṣu yoddhṛtvaṃ yoddhṛṣu sthitam
teṣu vṛttau tu labhate rājā jayaparājayau
anāśrite tu vyāpāre nimittaṃ hetur iṣyate
kriyāyai karaṇaṃ tasya dṛṣṭaḥ pratinidhis tathā
hetvarthā tu kriyā tasmān na sa pratinidhīyate
sarvadā sa tu san dharmaḥ kriyākāle nirūpyate
chedyaṃ prati vyāpriyate śaktimān gṛhyate tadā
prāṅ nimittāntarodbhūtaṃ kriyāyāḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
sādhanaṃ sahajaṃ kaiś cit kriyānyaiḥ pūrvam iṣyate
pravṛttir eva prathamaṃ kva cid apy anapāśritā
apūrvaṃ kālaśaktiṃ vā kriyāṃ vā kālam eva vā
tam evamlaksanam bhāvam ke cid āhuh katham ca na
dṛśyante tattvam āsāṃ tu ṣaṭ śaktīr nātivartate
tattve vā vyatireke vā vyatiriktaṃ tad ucyate
yat pṛthaktvam asaṃdigdhaṃ tad ekatvān na bhidyate
yad ekatvam asaṃdigdhaṃ tat pṛthaktvān na bhidyate
dyauḥ kṣamā vāyur ādityaḥ sāgarāḥ sarito diśaḥ
sa hy apūrvāparo bhāvaḥ kramarūpeṇa lakṣyate
nirvartyaṃ ca vikāryaṃ ca prāpyaṃ ceti tridhā matam
audāsīnyena yat prāpyaṃ yac ca kartur anīpsitam
saṃjñāntarair anākhyātaṃ yad yac cāpy anyapūrvakam
prakṛtes tu vivakṣāyāṃ vikāryaṃ kaiś cid anyathā
nirvartyaṃ ca vikāryaṃ ca karma śāstre pradarśitam
yad asaj jāyate sad vā janmanā yat prakāśyate
tan nirvartyaṃ vikāryaṃ ca karma dvedhā vyavasthitam
kriyākṛtā viśeṣāṇāṃ siddhir yatra na gamyate
darśanād anumānād vā tat prāpyam iti kathyate
avasthāṃ pañcamīm āhur ṇyante tāṃ karmakartari
bravīti pacater arthaṃ sidhyatir na vinā ṇicā
sa ṇyantaḥ pacater arthe prākṛte vyavatiṣṭhate
keṣāṃ cid devadattāder vyāpāro yaḥ sakarmake
kutaś cid āhṛtya padam evaṃ ca parikalpane
kriyāvyavasthā tv anyeṣāṃ śabdair eva prakāśyate
ādhāratvam iva prāptās te punar dravyakarmasu
atas taiḥ karmabhir dhātur yukto+adravyair akarmakaḥ
lasya karmaṇi bhāve ca nimittatvāya kalpate
tatsiddhaye kriyāyuktam anyat tv akathitaṃ smṛtam
karmaṇo+api svakakṣyāyāṃ na syād atiśayas tathā
karmaṇas tv āptum iṣṭatva āśrite+atiśayo yataḥ
ṇijante ca yathā kartā sakriyaḥ san prayujyate
na duhyādau tathā kartā niṣkriyo+api prayujyate
bhedavākyaṃ tu yan ṇyante nīduhiprakṛtau ca yat
nirvartyo vā vikāryo vā prāpyo vā sādhanāśrayaḥ
yadā guṇe tadā tadvad anuktāpi prakāśate
pacāv anuktaṃ yat karma ktvānte bhāvābhidhāyini
bhujau śaktyantare+apy ukte tat taddharma prakāśate
iṣeś ca gamisaṃsparśād grāme yo lo vidhīyate
paktvā bhujyata ity atra keṣāṃ cin na vyapekṣate
yan nirvṛttāśrayaṃ karma prāpter apracitaṃ punaḥ
bhedā ya ete catvāraḥ sāmānyena pradarśitāḥ
vivakṣyate yadā tatra karaṇatvaṃ tadā smṛtam
vastutas tad anirdeśyaṃ na hi vastu vyavasthitam
sthālyā pacyata ity eṣā vivakṣā dṛśyate yataḥ
karaṇeṣu tu saṃskāram ārabhante punaḥ punaḥ
svakakṣyāsu prakarṣaś ca karaṇānāṃ na vidyate
kriyāsiddhau prakarṣo+ayaṃ nyagbhāvas tv eva kartari
siddhau satyāṃ hi sāmānyaṃ sādhakatvaṃ prakṛṣyate
asyādīnāṃ tu kartṛtve taikṣṇyādi karaṇaṃ viduḥ
ātmabhede+api saty evam eko+arthaḥ sa tathā sthitaḥ
stokasya vābhinirvṛtter anirvṛtteś ca tasya vā
dharmāṇāṃ tadvatā bhedād abhedāc ca viśiṣyate
ārād apy upakāritve svātantryaṃ kartur ucyate
dharmair abhyuditaiḥ śabde niyamo na tu vastuni
bhāveṣv eva padanyāsaḥ prajñāyā vāca eva vā
nāstīty apy apade nāsti na ca sad bhidyate tataḥ
teṣām anyena tattvena vyavahāro na vidyate
ākāśasya yathā bhedaś chāyāyāś calanaṃ yathā
janmanāśāv abhede+api tathā kaiś cit prakalpitau
vikāro janmanaḥ kartā prakṛtir veti saṃśaye
kḷpi saṃpadyamāne yā caturthī sā vikārataḥ
vākye saṃpadyateḥ kartā saṅghaś cvyantasya kathyate
atvaṃ saṃpadyate yas tvaṃ na tasmin yuṣmadāśrayā
savyāpārataraḥ kaś cit kva cid dharmaḥ pratīyate
gamyeta sādhanaṃ hy atra savyāpāraṃ pratīyate
tvam anyo bhavasīty eṣā tatra syāt parikalpanā
rājñi bhṛtyatvamāpanne yathā tadvad gatir bhavet
dravyamātrasya tu praiṣe pṛcchyāder loḍ vidhīyate
sakriyasya prayogas tu yadā sa viṣayo ṇicaḥ
kriyāyāḥ prerakaṃ karma hetuḥ kartuḥ prayojakaḥ
bhedasya ca vivakṣāyāṃ pūrvāṃ pūrvāṃ kriyāṃ prati
vikalpenaiva sarvatra saṃjñe syātām ubhe yadi
ārambheṇa na yogasya pratyākhyānaṃ samaṃ bhavet
āsthitaṃ karma yat tatra dvairūpyaṃ bhajate kriyā
saṃyogabhedād bhinnātmā gamir eva bhramir yathā
dravyasvabhāvo na dhrauvyam iti sūtre pratīyate
apāyaviṣayaṃ dhrauvyaṃ yat tu tāvad vivakṣitam
saraṇe devadattasya dhrauvyaṃ pāte tu vājinaḥ
ubhāv apy adhruvau meṣau yady apy ubhayakarmaje
vibhāge pravibhakte tu kriye tatra vivakṣite
meṣayoḥ svakriyāpekṣaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
abhedena kriyaikā tu dvisādhyā ced vivakṣitā
meṣāv apāye kartārau yady anyo vidyate+avadhiḥ
gatir vinā tv avadhinā nāpāya iti gamyate
vṛkṣasya parṇaṃ patatīty evaṃ bhāṣye nidarśitam
yugapan na vivakṣyante sarve dharmā balāhake
karaṇatvaṃ yato nāsti tasmāt tad ubhayaṃ saha
ekaiva vā satī śaktir dvirūpā vyavatiṣṭhate
nirdhāraṇe vibhakte yo bhītrādīnāṃ ca yo vidhiḥ
idam atreti bhāvānām abhāvān na prakalpate
yady apy upavasir deśa- viśeṣam anurudhyate
vyatirekaḥ sa dharmau dvau labhate viṣayāntare
prādhānyaṃ svaguṇe labdhvā pradhāne yāti śeṣatām
saṃbodhanaṃ na vākyārtha iti pūrvebhya āgamaḥ
dravyaṃ tu yad yathābhūtaṃ tad atyantaṃ tathā bhavet
tasmād yat karaṇaṃ dravyaṃ tat karma na punar bhavet
dhvaniḥ kramanivṛttau tu dhvanir ity eva kathyate
śvete śvetata ity etac chvetatvena prakāśate
kramāt sadasatāṃ teṣām ātmāno na samūhinām
yathā gaur iti samghātaḥ sarvo nendriyagocaraḥ
kālānupāti yad rūpaṃ tad astīty anugamyate
paritas tu paricchinnaṃ bhāva ity eva kathyate
anantaraṃ phalaṃ yasyāḥ kalpate tām kriyām viduḥ
satsu pratyayarūpo+asau bhāvo yāvan na jāyate
tāvat pareṣāṃ rūpeṇa sādhyaḥ sann abhidhīyate
na kriyāvācināṃ tasmāt prayogas tatra vidyate
asan nivartate tasmād yat sat tad upalabhyate
tayoḥ sadasatoś cāsāv ātmaika iva gṛhyate
ante yā vā kriyābhāge jātiḥ saiva kriyā smṛtā
antye vātmani yā sattā sā kriyā kaiś cid iṣyate
bhāva eva hi dhātvartha ity avicchinna āgamaḥ
buddhiṃ tajjātim anye tu buddhisattām athāpare
*pūrvabhāgas tu yaj jātāt taj janmety apadiśyate
phalaṃ phalāpadeśo vā vastu vā tadvirodhi yat
tad anyad eva pūrveṣāṃ nāga ity apadiśyate
naivāsti naiva nāstīti vastuno grahanād vinā
kaś cid vedāprakāśe+api prakāśe tata eva vā
vyāpi saukṣmyaṃ kva cid yāti kva cit saṃhanyate punaḥ
akurvāṇo+atha vā kiṃ cit svaśaktyaivaṃ prakāśate
bhāgair iva prakḷptiś ca tāṃ kriyām apare viduḥ
sādhyā ca sādhanaṃ caiva phalaṃ bhoktā phalasya ca
kriyām anye tu manyante kva cid apy anapāśritām
prakṛtiḥ sādhanānāṃ sā prathamaṃ tac ca kārakam
saṃsarge kaś cid esāṃ tu prādhānyena pratīyate
sādhyatve vā tiṅantena kṛtāṃ bhedo na kaś cana
ṣaṣṭhvāḥ sā lena saṃbandhe vyudastā kartṛkarmanoḥ
na saṃbhavati siddhatve sa sādhyaḥ syāt kathaṃ punaḥ
etāvat sādhanaṃ sādhyam etāvad iti kalpanā
śāstra eva na vākye+asti vibhāgaḥ paramārthataḥ
prakalpitā yathā śāstre sa ghañādisv api kramaḥ
sattvabhāvas tu yas tasyāḥ sa ghañādinibandhanaḥ
tatra yam prati sādhyatvam asiddhā taṃ prati kriyā
siddhā tu yasmin sādhyatvaṃ na tam eva punaḥ prati
rājñaḥ putrasya napteti na rājñi vyatiricyate
tiṅantair antareṇevam upamānaṃ tato na taiḥ
sādhanatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ ca tiṅkṣu saṃbandhināṃ yataḥ
tenādhyāropa eva syād upamā tu na vidyate
kriyā caivāśraye sarvā tatra tatra samāpyate
ātau tasya samāptatvād upamārtho na vidyate
siddheś ca prakrame sādhyam upamātum na śakyate
arthātmā bhidyate bhāve sa bāhyābhyantare kramaḥ
sāmānye bhāva ity atra yal liṅgam upalabhyate
bhedānāṃ anumeyatvān na tat teṣu vivakṣyate
na ca liṅgam pacādināṃ bhavatau samavasthitam
ekaś ca so+arthaḥ sattākhyaḥ katham cit kaiś cid ucyate
nityam ekaṃ vibhu dravyaṃ parimāṇaṃ kriyāvatām
kriyābhedāya kālas tu saṃkhyā sarvasya bhedikā
utpattau ca sthitau caiva vināśe cāpi tadvatām
yadi na pratibadhnīyāt pratibandhaṃ ca notsṛjet
na hi bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā vastu kiṃ cana vidyate
naiko na cāpy aneko+asti na śuklo nāpi cāsitaḥ
dravyātmā sa tu saṃsargād evaṃrūpaḥ prakāśate
saṃsargināṃ tu ye bhedā viśeṣās tasya te matāḥ
sa bhinnas tair vyavasthānāṃ kālo bhedāya kalpate
sthitasyānugrahas tais tair dharmaiḥ saṃsargibhis tataḥ
kāla eva hi viśvātmā vyāpāra iti kathyate
sa kalāḥ kalayan sarvāḥ kālākhyāṃ labhate vibhuḥ
pratibhaddhāś ca yās tena citrā viśvasya vṛttayaḥ
tāḥ sa evānujānāti yathā tantuḥ śakuntikāḥ
kuto+apy adbhutayā vṛttyā śaktibhiḥ sā niyamyate
tatas tu samavāyākhyā śaktir bhedasya bādhikā
ekatvam iva tā vyaktīr āpādayati kāraṇaiḥ
athāsmān niyamād ūrdhvaṃ jātayo yāḥ prayojikāḥ
tāḥ sarvā vyaktim āyānti svacche chāyā ivāmbhasi
āśrayāṇāṃ ca nityatvam āśritānāṃ ca nityatā
tā vyaktīr anugṛhṇāti sthitis tena prakalpate
naiṣāṃ sattām anudgṛhya vṛttir janmavatāṃ smṛtā
sā śaktīḥ pratibadhnāti jāyante ca virodhinaḥ
prayojakās tu ye bhāvāḥ sthitibhāgasya hetavaḥ
tirobhavanti te sarve yata ātmā prahīyate
jahāti sahavṛttāś ca kriyāḥ sa samavasthitāḥ
samatvaṃ viṣamatvaṃ vā sa ekaḥ pratipadyate
ārambhaś ca kriyā caiva niṣṭhā cety abhidhīyate
yāvāṃś ca dvyaṇukādīnāṃ tāvān himavato+apy asau
na hy ātmā kasya cid bhettuṃ pracetuṃ vāpi śakyate
anyais tu bhāvair anyeṣāṃ pracayaḥ parikalpyate
śanair idam idaṃ kṣipram iti tena pratīyate
asataś ca kramo nāsti sa hi bhettuṃ na śakyate
bhūtaḥ pañcavidhas tatra bhaviṣyaṃś ca caturvidhaḥ
kāle nidhāya svaṃ rūpaṃ prajñayā yan nigṛhyate
bhāvināṃ caiva yad rūpaṃ tasya ca pratibimbakam
ayanapravibhāgaś ca gatīś ca jyotiṣāṃ dhruvā
nakṣatrākhyā pṛthak teṣu cihnamātraṃ tu tārakāḥ
bhedā iva trayaḥ siddhā yāṃl loko nātivartate
dvābhyāṃ sa kila śaktibhyāṃ bhāvānāṃ varaṇātmakaḥ
atītākhyā tu yā śaktis tayā janma virudhyate
dvau tu tatra tamorūpāv ekasyālokavat sthitiḥ
atītam api keṣāṃ cit punar viparivartate
keṣāṃ cid vartamānatvāc caiti tadvad atītatām
dve eva kālasya vibhoḥ keṣāṃ cic chaktivartmanī
ke cid buddhyanusaṃhāra- lakṣaṇaṃ taṃ pracakṣate
jñānānugataśaktiṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā satyataḥ sthitam
tisro bhāvasya bhāvasya keṣāṃ cid bhāvaśaktayaḥ
tābhiḥ svaśaktibhiḥ sarvaṃ sadaivāsti ca nāsti ca
kramas tās tadabhedāc ca sadasattvaṃ na bhidyate
adhvanām ekatā nāsti na ca kiṃ cin nivartate
prathamaṃ tad avidyāyāṃ yad vidyāyāṃ na vidyate
viśiṣṭam avadhiṃ taṃ tam upādāya prakalpate
tāvān eva kṣaṇaḥ kālo yugamanvantarāṇi vā
yad ambhasi prakṣaraṇaṃ tat kālasyaiva ceṣṭitam
alpe mahati vā chidre tatsaṃbandhe na bhidyate
ākrīḍa iva kālasya dṛśyate yaḥ svaśaktibhiḥ
tvacisārasya vā vṛddhiṃ tṛṇarājasya vā dadhat
ataḥ kriyāntarābhāve sā kriyā kāla iṣyate
bhūto ghaṭa itīyaṃ ca sattāyā eva bhūtatā
parato bhidyate sarvam ātmā tu na vikalpyate
sādṛśyāt sati bhede tu tadaṅgatvena gṛhyate
sad asad vāpi vastu syāt tṛtīyaṃ nāsti kiṃ cana
tena bhūtabhaviṣyantau muktvā madhyaṃ na vidyate
sad asad vāpi tenaikaṃ kramarūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
nirvṛttirūpaṃ nirvṛtteḥ sāmānyam atha vā bhavet
kāryotpattau samarthaṃ vā svena dharmeṇa tat tathā
na ca bhūtam anutpannaṃ na bhaviṣyat tathāvidham
bhāvy āsīd iti sūtreṇa tat kāle+anyatra śiṣyate
svakāla eva sādhutve kālabhede gatiḥ katham
na syād atyantabhūtatvam evaikaṃ tatra saṃbhavet
āmiśra eva prakrāntaḥ sa padārthas tathāvidhaḥ
śuddhe ca kāle vyākhyātam āmiśre na prasidhyati
adhyasyate viruddhe+arthe na ca tena virudhyate
bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ity etau pratyayau vartamānatām
tatra rūpaṃ yad adhyastaṃ tatkālaṃ tat pratīyate
niṣpattāv avadhiḥ kaś cit kaś cit prativivakṣitaḥ
yaḥ samāsādanād bhedaḥ sa tatra na vivakṣitaḥ
yogād vā strītvapuṃstvābhyāṃ na kiṃ cid avatiṣṭhate
svasminn ātmani tatrānyad bhūtaṃ bhāvi ca kathyate
sad asad vāpi caitanyam etābhyām avagamyate
caitanyabhāge prathamaḥ puruṣo na tu vartate
saṃbodhanārthaḥ sarvatra madhyame kaiś cid iṣyate
tathā saṃbodhane sarvāṃ prathamāṃ yuṣmado viduḥ
svāhendraśatrur vardhasva yathā rājā bhaveti ca
yuṣmadaḥ prathamāntasya paraś cen na padād asau
nirdeśaś cānyathā śāstre nityatvān na virudhyate
yathānirdeśam arthāḥ syur yesāṃ śāstraṃ vidhāyakam
kim cit sāmānyam āśritya sthite tu pratipādanam
yo+aśve yaḥ pīṭha ity atra bhūtayor aśvapīṭhayoḥ
sa dharmo vyatirikto vā teṣāṃ ātmaiva vā tathā
samavetā paricchedye kva cid anyatra sā sthitā
paratve cāparatve ca bhede tulyā śrutir yathā
svabuddhyā tam apoddhṛtya loko+apy āgamam āśritaḥ
yathaivāviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na kiṃ cid avabhāsate
tathā bhāvo+apy asaṃsṛṣṭo na kaś cid upalabhyate
bhedena tu samākhyātaṃ yal loko+apy anuvartate
buddhau sthiteṣu teṣv evam adhyāropo na durlabhaḥ
paradharmasya na hy atra sadasattvaṃ prayojakam
saṃkhyāsu saṃkhyā liṅgeṣu liṅgam evaṃ prakalpate
saṃsṛṣṭeṣv api nirbhāge bhūteṣv arthakriyā yathā
sattvādiṣu ca mātrāsu sarvāsv evaṃ pratīyate
vinā tena na saṃkhyānām anyāsām asti saṃbhavaḥ
ekatvābhyāṃ samutpannam evaṃ vā tat pratīyate
ekatvasamudāyo vā sāpekṣe vā pṛthak pṛthak
ekatve dvitvam ity evaṃ tayor dvivacanaṃ bhavet
samūhatve tu tan na syāt svāṅgādisamudāyavat
na saṃkhyāyāṃ na saṃkhyeye dvau daśety asti saṃbhavaḥ
bhedābhāvān na saṃkhyāyāṃ virodhān na tadāśraye
saṃkhyā nāma na saṃkhyāsti saṃjñaiṣeti yathocyate
rūpaṃ na rūpam apy evaṃ samjñā sā hi sitādiṣu
rūpatvajātiyogāc ca rūpe rūpam iti smṛtam
nimittam ekam ity atra vibhaktyā nābhidhīyate
tadvatas tu yad ekatvaṃ vibhaktis tatra vartate
ekasya pracayo dṛṣṭaḥ samūhaś ca dvayos tathā
tad ekam api caikatvaṃ vibhaktiśravaṇād ṛte
nocyate tena śabdena vibhaktyā tu sahocyate
syātām asati tasmimś ca prakṛtyartho na kalpyate
ya ātmanepadād bhedaḥ kva cid arthasya gamyate
anyataś cāpi lādeśān manyante tam upagraham
kva cit sādhanam evāsau kva cit tasya viśeṣaṇam
lādeśaiḥ sa kriyābhedo vākyeṣv api niyamyate
dhātvarthas tadviśeṣaś cāpy uktaḥ kva cid upagrahaḥ
kesāṃ cit kartrabhiprāye ṇicā saha vikalpate
krīṇīṣva vapate dhatte cinoti cinute+api ca
saṃvidhānaṃ pacādināṃ kva cid arthaḥ pratīyate
tathābhūtā kriyā yā hi tatkartā phalabhāg yataḥ
kesāṃ cid anye tu kṛtāḥ svariteto ñitas tathā
tulyārtheṣv api cāvaśyaṃ na sarveṣv ekadharmatā
bhidyate na tu liṅgākhyo bhedas tatra tadāśritaḥ
tasmād avasthite+apy arthe kasya cit pratibadhyate
śabdasya śaktiḥ sa tv eṣa śāstre+anvākhyāyate vidhiḥ
tat pradhānaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ na lābhādi prayojanam
yatrobhau svāmidāsau tu prārabhete saha kriyām
yugapad dharmabhedena dhātus tatra na vartate
ity ayaṃ śeṣaviṣayaḥ kaiś cid atrānuvarṇyate
atha pratividhātā yo halaiḥ kṛṣati pañcabhiḥ
śuddhe tu saṃvidhānārthe kaiś cid atreṣyate kṛṣiḥ
taddharmā yajir ity evaṃ na syāt tatrātmanepadam
tisro jātaya evaitāḥ kesāṃ cit samavasthitāḥ
hastinyāṃ vaḍavāyāṃ ca strīti buddheḥ samanvayaḥ
buddhyā kalpitarūpeṣu liṅgeṣv api ca saṃbhavaḥ
strītvādīnāṃ vyavasthā hi sā liṅgair vyapadiśyate
mukhyebhya iva liṅgebhyo bhedā loke vyavasthitāḥ
atyantādarśane na syād asattvaṃ prati niścayaḥ
siddhe hi darśane kiṃ syād anumānaprayojanam
kā cit pralīyate kā cit kathaṃ cid abhivardhate
pravṛtter ekarūpatvaṃ sāmyaṃ vā sthitir ucyate
guṇā ity eva buddher vā nimittatvaṃ sthitir matā
kasya cic chabdasaṃskāre vyāpāraḥ kva cid iṣyate
saṃnidhāne nimittānāṃ kiṃ cid eva pravartakam
yad yad dharme+aṅgatām eti liṅgaṃ tat tat pracakṣate
utpattiḥ prasavo+anyeṣāṃ nāśaḥ saṃstyānam ity api
ātmarūpaṃ tu bhāvānāṃ sthitir ity apadiśyate
dṛṣṭaṃ nimittaṃ kesāṃ cij jātyādivad avasthitam
nānātvaṃ janayantīva śabdā liṅge+api sa kramaḥ
nimittadarśanād arthe kaiś cit sarvatra varṇyate
kutsitasthā tu yā kutsā tadarthaḥ ko vidhīyate
kutsitatvena kutsyo vā na samyag vāpi kutsitaḥ
na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā bhedābhāvāt pratīyate
rūpābhedād viśeṣaṃ tam abhivyaṅktuṃ na śaknutaḥ
dravyāvasthā tṛtīyā tu yasyāṃ saṃsṛjyate dvayam
buddhyāvasthā vibhajyante sā hy arthasya vidhāyikā
bhedābhedāv upādāya kva cid ekāctvam ucyate
dravyātmānas trayas tasmād buddhau nānā vyavasthitāḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca śabdayoḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
evaṃ jātimati dravye pratyāsanne kriyāṃ prati
tile pūrvam upātte vā tatraiva matub iṣyate
sa ca dharmaḥ samāseṣu guṇas tasmād viśeṣaṇam
bhinnam atrādhikaraṇaṃ prāg vṛttes tac ca gṛhyate
pratyekaṃ jātivad vṛttis tathā dvandvapadeṣv api
te viṣṇumitrā iti ca bhinneṣu sahacāriṣu
yābhyāṃ caikam anekārthaṃ tābhyām evāparaṃ padam
duḥkhā durupapādā ca tasmād bhāṣye+apy udāhṛtā
vibhāgena samākhyāne tatas tad dvyartham ucyate
vākye+api niyatā dharmāḥ ke cid vṛttau dvayos tathā
te tv abhedena sāmarthya- mātra evopavarṇitāḥ
vṛttir anyapadārthe yā tasyā vākyeṣv asaṃbhavaḥ
cārthe dvandvapadānāṃ ca bhede vṛttir na vidyate
prāg vṛtter jātivācitvaṃ na ca gaurakharādiṣu
na nityagrahaṇaṃ yuktaṃ kauṭilye yaṅvidhau yathā
vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca sāmānye kaiś cid iṣyate
svārthavat sā vyapekṣāsya vṛttāv api na hīyate
abudhān praty upāyāś ca vicitrāḥ pratipattaye
śabdāntaratvād yuktādiḥ kva cid vākye prayujyate
nīlotpalādy api tathā bhāgābhyāṃ vartate vinā
saptaparṇādivad bhedo na vṛttau vidyate kva cit
yā sāmānyāśrayā saṃjñā viśeṣaviṣayā ca yā
bheda eva vibhāṣāyā niyato viṣayo yataḥ
yataś cāviṣayaḥ so+asyās tasmān nāsty akṛtārthatā
mahākaṣṭaśritety evaṃ na syād bhedaḥ padatraye
mahāraṇyam atīte tu tripadād bhidyate svaraḥ
dvipade tena yagapat tritayaṃ na samasyate
śabdāntaratvād vākye tu vṛttau nityaṃ na vidyate
akarmakatve saty evaṃ ktāntaṃ bhāvābhidhāyi tat
tataḥ kriyāvatā kartrā yogo bhavati karmaṇām
putrīyatau na putro+asti viśeṣecchā tu tādṛśī
prāṇair vinā yathā dhārir jīvatau prāṇakarmakaḥ
na cātra dhārir na prāṇā jīvatis tu kriyāntaram
sad apīcchākyacaḥ karma vākya eva prayujyate
śabdā yathā vibhajyante bhāgair iva vikalpitaiḥ
padaṃ vākye pade dhātur dhātau bhāgaś ca muṇḍivat
yathaiva ḍitthe davatiḥ pācake pacatis tathā
ḍayatiś ca paciś caiva dvāv apy etāv alaukikau
prakṛtipratyayāv ūhyau padāt tābhyāṃ padaṃ tathā
anubandhasvarādibhyaḥ śiṣṭaiḥ śāstraṃ na tān prati
taddhito yogabhedena vākyaṃ vā syād vibhāṣitam
vyatiriktasya sādhutve tad eva ca nidarśanam
punaś ca pratisaṃhāre vṛttim eke pracakṣate
vyāpāre tannimittānāṃ na grāhyaṃ syāt tathā sthitam
tasmād anupakāre vā grāhyaṃ vā na tathā sthitam
abudhān prati vṛttiṃ ca vartayantaḥ prakalpitām
anvayād gamyate so+artho virodhī vā nivartate
upāyamātraṃ nānātvaṃ samūhas tv eka eva saḥ
vācikā dyotikā vāpi saṃkhyānāṃ vā vibhaktayaḥ
avibhāgena vartante tāṃ saṃkhyāṃ tādṛśīṃ viduḥ
bhedānāṃ vā parityāgāt saṃkhyātmā sa tathāvidhaḥ
prakhyāyate na śuklādi- bhedarūpas tu gṛhyate
bhāgaḥ prakāśitaḥ kaś cic chāstre+aṅgatvena gṛhyate
avyayānāṃ ca yo dharmo yaś ca bhedavatāṃ kramaḥ
alukaś caikavadbhāvas tasmin sati na śiṣyate
jātau dvivacanābhāvāt tad vṛttiṣu na vidyate
prāg vṛtter yuktavadbhāve ṣaṣṭhī bhedāśrayā bhavet
vidyamānāsu saṃkhyāsu ke cit saṃkhyāntaraṃ viduḥ
vyāpāraṃ yāti bhedākhyais tat svair avayavaiḥ kva cit
ātmā bhedānapekṣo+asya kva cid eti nimittatām
dāsyāḥ patir iti vyakto godāv iti ca dṛśyate
dvyādināṃ ca dviputrādau bāhyo bhedo nivartate
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād ubhaśabde na tat tathā
ubhayas tatra tulyārtho vṛttau nityaṃ prayujyate
ubhe iti tataḥ svārthe bhede vṛttiḥ prayujyate
svabhāvād aparārthatvāt tatra bhedo na hīyate
pratyayaṃ tayapaṃ hitvā nāsty uttarapade punaḥ
kumāryagāre na hy asti samāso vacanāntare
ekadvayor yañādināṃ vibhāṣā luṅ na kalpate
yauṣmākas tāvakaś ceti bhedābhāvān na sidhyati
dṛṣṭo gārgyatare bhedas tathā gargatarā iti
ādeśaiḥ samjnayā vāpi vibhaktyā vyajyate vinā
vayasvini paricchedaḥ krīte cāpi na gamyate
taddharmatvād abhedāt tu ghaṭādibhyo na dṛśyate
śrūyate vacanaṃ yatra bhāvas tatra viśiṣyate
nivartate yad vacanaṃ tasya bhāvo na vidyate
vākye dṛṣṭaṃ yad atyantam abhāvas tasya vṛttiṣu
abhāvo vā luko yatra rūpavān vā vidhīyate
sarvatraiva viśeṣas tu nāvaśyaṃ tādṛśo bhavet
āteś ca bhedahetutvān na liṅgena viśeṣyate
pradhānaṃ mṛgadugdhādau gārgīputre na sa kramaḥ
abhede liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ yogāc chuklaṃ paṭā iti
śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ
vṛtter abhinnarūpatvāt teṣu vṛttir na vidyate
tasmāt tadāśrayaṃ liṅgaṃ vacanaṃ ca prasajyate
saliṅgaṃ ca sasaṃkhyaṃ ca tato dravyābhidhāyinā
saṃbadhyate padaṃ tatra tayor bhinnā śrutir bhavet
yasmād viśeṣas tenātra bhedakāryaṃ na kalpate
viśeṣa eva sāmānyaṃ viśesād bhidyate yataḥ
yad yad āśrīyate tat tad anyasya vinivartakam
prayogeṣv eva sādhutvaṃ vākye prakramyate tadā
sāmānyaṃ yat tad atyantaṃ tatraiva samavasthitam
na gotvaṃ śābaleyasya gaur iti vyapadiśyate
vyatireke ca saty evaṃ matupaḥ śravanaṃ bhavet
lug anvākhyāyate tasmād rasādibhyaś ca nāsti saḥ
yat so+ayam iti saṃbandhād rūpābhedena vartate
śuklādivat tato lopas tad rasādau na vidyate
āveśo liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ kva cin mañcādivat sthitah
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhe sa prasthādau na vidyate
ta āśraye+api vidyanta iti buddhir nivartyate
viśeṣaṇaṃ tato dharmāñ jātes tat pratipadyate
nyakkāriṇi syur utkṛṣṭe prakṛteḥ syād viliṅgatā
kālyāṃ kālād dvitīyāntāt kāle kālyās tarab bhavet
nyakkāriṇi tathā gārgye gargebhyaḥ pratyayo bhavet
nyakkartṛṣu ca gargeṣu gārgyāt syāt tac ca neṣyate
kumāryāḥ svārthike ṅīp syāt prakṛtyartho hi nādhikaḥ
upāttaṃ ca prakṛtyartho dravyam evāśrayas tayoḥ
rūpābhedāc ca tad dravyam ākāṅkṣāvat pratīyate
viśeṣair bhinnarūpais tad āśrayair iva yujyate
saṃkhyā ca tābhyām dravyātmā so+abhinno vyapadiśyate
stryarthas tasyecchayā yogaḥ prakṛtyā pratyayena vā
stryarthaḥ saṃstyānavad dravyaṃ prakṛtyarthaś ca yady asau
saṃstyānena kva cid dravyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yady upalakṣitam
brāhmaṇyādau yadā vṛttās tebhyaḥ syuḥ pratyayās tadā
prakṛtyarthaś ca saṃstyānaṃ svārthikāḥ pratyayās tadā
saṃstyāne kevale vṛttiḥ prakṛtīnām na vidyate
upakāri ca saṃstyānaṃ yeṣu śabdeṣv apekṣitam
tebhyaṣ ṭābādayas tac ca bhūtādiṣv avivakṣitam
yasmād bhinnair api dravyais tad ekaṃ sad viśiṣyate
mātrāṇām hi tirobhāve parimāṇam na vidyate
kumārya iti tena syāt kumāryāṃ bhedasaṃbhavāt
luk taddhitalukīti syāl luk tatrāpy upalakṣaṇam
kesāṃ cit tyaktabhedeṣu dravyeṣv eva vidhīyate
kṛte buddhyaiva bhedānām āśrayatve ca kalpite
taddharmatvaṃ tato dvandve cādiṣv arthakṛtaṃ hi tat
cārthaḥ śabde kva cid bhedāt kathaṃ cit samavasthitaḥ
dyotakāś cādayas tasya vaktā dvandvas tu tadvatām
dyotakatvān na kalpeta tasmāt sad upalakṣyate
śabdaḥ kaś cit tam evārthaṃ kathaṃ cit pratipadyate
śabdād arthāḥ pratāyante sa bhedānāṃ vidhāyakaḥ
anumānaṃ vivakṣāyāḥ śabdād anyan na vidyate
nipāto liṅgasaṃkhyābhyāṃ dvandvas tv arthasya vācakaḥ
yasya nāsti kriyāyogaḥ svatantro+asau na vidyate
artho dvandvasya tatra syād upādānam anarthakam
nimittam api cāsyārthaḥ svadharmair yujyate tataḥ
bāhyo nāsty āśrayo dvandve viśeṣau tatra hi śrutau
ekaḥ samūho dharmān sa bhāgayoḥ pratipadyate
yau bhedāv āśritas tatsthe liṅgasaṃkhye prapadyate
yathā gaur iti śuklāder abhidhānaṃ na vidyate
saṃbandhī niyato rūḍhaś citrāṇāṃ na ca vidyate
gavāṃ yathā vajrapāṇis tryakṣe vā+api vyavasthitaḥ
śabdāntaratvād vākyeṣu viśeṣā yady api śrutāḥ
na citragur viśeṣāṇāṃ rūpābhedāt tu vācakaḥ
yathā citragur ity etat prayukte na prayujyate
evaṃ yadi syāt sāmānyaṃ tasya na syāt pratiśrutiḥ
sa prātipadikārthaś ca tathābhūtaḥ kathaṃ bhatvet
bhedena tu vivakṣāyāṃ sāmānye vā vivakṣite
sādhutvaṃ na vibhaktyartha- mātre vṛttasya dṛśyate
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād dravyavṛttir ayaṃ yadā
sādharmyam avyayena syād bahuvrīhes tathā sati
vinā vibhaktyā saṃbandho vibhaktyā vidyate vinā
vastvantaram upakṣiptam iti ke cit pracakṣate
saṃbandhair vā viśiṣṭānāṃ tadvatāṃ syān nimittatā
ke cit saṃyogino daṇḍād viṣāṇāt samavāyinaḥ
tadvati pratyayān āhur bahuvrīhiṃ tathaiva ca
svāmini vyatirekaś ca vākye yady api dṛśyate
asyaitā iti tatrārthe bahuvrīhir na vidyate
yadā pratyavamarśas tu tāsāṃ svāmī gavām iti
nānā citrā iti yathā nimittam anurudhyate
nānābhūte+api vṛttaḥ san bahuvrīhis tathā bhavet
saṃbandhini nimitte tu dravyadharmo na hīyate
āsanna eva dravyatvāt taddharmair na virudhyate
vibhaktyarthena cāviṣṭaṃ śuddhaṃ ceti dvidhā sthitam
dravyaṃ śuddhasya yo dharmaḥ sa na syād anyadharmaṇaḥ
dravyāśritatvaṃ hi tayos tato+anyasya na sidhyataḥ
nañsamase yatas tatra trayaḥ pakṣā vicāritāḥ
abrahmaṇādiṣu nañaḥ prayogo na hi vidyate
prāk samāsāt padārthānāṃ nivṛttir dyotyate nañā
kriyayā yasya saṃbandho vṛttis tasya na vidyate
ktvānte ca tumunante ca nañsamāse na dṛśyate
kāmacāre ca saty evam asataḥ syāt pradhānatā,
guṇatvam itareṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ vā syāt pradhānatā
jātyā bhinnāṃ tataḥ sattāṃ prasaktām apakarṣati
akṛtaś ceti saṃghātaḥ sa evābrāhmaṇe kramaḥ
atha jātimato+arthasya kaś cid dharmo nivartitaḥ
avaśyaṃ brāhmaṇe kaś cit kva cid dharmo na vidyate
śabdasya vṛttir yady asti nañaḥ śrutir anarthikā
yady apy ubhayavṛttitvaṃ pradhānaṃ tu pratīyate
prasthānaṃ gamyate śuddhe tadarthe+api na tiṣṭhatau
ayaṃ padārtha etasmin kṣatriyādau na vidyate
buddher viṣayatāṃ prāpte śabdād arthe pratīyate
pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā grutyā hy artho+anusajyate
śabdapravṛttir na tv asti loṣṭādiṣu viparyayāt
anekasmād asa iti prādhānye sati sidhyati
pradhānam atra bhedyatvād ekārtho vikṛto nañā
hitvā svadharmān vartante dvyādayo+apy ekatāṃ gatāḥ
vṛttau tasya pradhānatvāt sā saṃkhyā na nivartate
aneka iti paścāc ca tiṣṭhatīty anuṣajyate
sādhyatvāt tatra siddhena kriyā dravyeṇa lakṣyate
prāg evāṅgīkṛtaṃ dravyam ataḥ pūrveṇa bhidyate
vākye+api tena naikatva- mātram eva nivartyate
tailena bhojane+aprāpte na tv anyad upasecanam
asan brāhmaṇa ity ābhyāṃ tathānye kṣatriyādayaḥ
asāsno gaur iti yathā, gavayo vyapadiśyate
jātyantaraṃ na gor eva sasnābhāvaḥ pratīyate
tadrūpatvāt sa hemanta ity abhinnaḥ pratīyate
na caivaṃviṣayaḥ kaś cid bahuvrīhiḥ prakalpate
agur aśva iti vyāptir nañsamāsena yasya na
brāhmaṇatvena cāsattvād ucyate sat tad anyathā
asad ity api sattvena sataḥ sattā nivartyate
samāse śrūyate svārtho yena tadvāṃs tadāśrayaḥ
te kṣatriyādibhir vācyā vācyā vā sarvanāmabhiḥ
ekatvād ekaśabdatvaṃ nyāyyaṃ tasyāś ca varṇyate
āśrayāṇāṃ hi liṅgaiḥ sā niyatair eva yujyate
virodhitvāt prasajyeta nāśritaṃ tac ca laukikam
sāmānyam ākṛtir bhāvo jātir ity atra laukikam
liṅgaṃ na saṃbhavaty eva tenānyat parigṛhyate
pravṛttir iti sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya kathyate
āvirbhāvas tirobhāvaḥ sthitiś cety atha bhidyate
satataṃ na viyujyante vācaś caivātra saṃbhavaḥ
tenāsya citirūpaṃ ca citikālaś ca bhidyate
tasya svarūpabhedas tu na kaś cid api vidyate
avasthā tādṛśī nāsti yā liṅgena na yujyate
kva cit tu śabdasaṃskāro liṅgasyānāśraye sati
śāstre liṅgaṃ guṇāvasthā tathā cākṛtir iṣyate
liṅgaṃ prati na bhedo+asti dravyapakṣe+api kaś cana
yatas tad ākṛtau śāstram anyathaiva samarthyate
vartate yo bahuṣv artho +abhede tasya vivakṣite
yadā tv āśrayabhedena bheda eva pratīyate
ākṛter dravyapakṣena tadā bhedo na vidyate
abhede tv ekaśabdatvāc chāstrāc ca vacane sati
ekaśeṣo na vaktavyo vacanānāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ
vyapadeśo+abhidheyena na śāstre kaś cid āśritaḥ
dravyaṃ nāma padārtho yo na ca sa pratiṣidhyate
upakāri guṇaḥ śeṣaḥ parārtha iti kalpanā
ākṛtau vā pradhānatvam ata evaṃ samarthyate
na vṛttivat parārthasya guṇabhāvas tu varṇyate
so+ayam ity abhisaṃbandhād āśrayair ākṛteḥ saha
pākau pākā iti yathā bhedakaḥ kaiś cid āśrayaḥ
tattvenāha tathā jāti- śabdo dravyeṣu vartate
asyedam iti vā yatra so+ayam ity api vā śrutiḥ
yat pradhānaṃ na tasyāsti svarūpam anirūpanāt
saṃsargaśrutir artheṣu sākṣād eva na vartate
jātau vṛtto yadā dravye sa śabdo vartate punaḥ
dravyasya sati saṃsparśe dravyam āśrīyate yadā
anirjātasya nirjñānaṃ yena tan mānam ucyate
śyāmatvam ekaṃ guṇayor ubhayor api vartate
yenaiva hetunā śyāmā śastrī tatra pratīyate
sa hetur devadattāyāḥ pratyaye na viśiṣyate
āśrayād yo guṇe bhedo jāter yā cāviśiṣṭatā
aśabdavācyo yo bhedaḥ śyāmamātre na vartate
śyāmeṣu keṣu cid vṛttir yasya so+atra vyapekṣyate
śyāmeṣu keṣu cit kiṃ cit kiṃ cit sarvatra vartate
sāmānyaṃ kaś cid ekasmiñ chyāme bhedo vyavasthitaḥ
tathā hi sati saurabhye bhedo jātyutpalādiṣu
gandhānāṃ sati bhede tu sādṛśyam upalabhyate
guṇānām āśrayād bhedaḥ svato vāpy anugamyate
anirdeśyād viśeṣād vā saṃkarād vā guṇāntaraiḥ
upameyatvam ādhikye sāmye vā na nivartate
anyais tu mānaṃ jātyādi bhedyasyārthasya varṇyate
mitas tu svena mānena prasiddho yo guṇāśrayaḥ
bhinnena yasya bhedyānām upamānaṃ tad ucyate
śastrīkumāryoḥ sadṛśaḥ śyāma ity evam āśrite
śastryāṃ prasiddhaṃ śyāmatvaṃ mānaṃ sā tena mīyate
anyā śyāmā tu tadrūpā tenātyantaṃ na mīyate
sādhāraṇaṃ bruvan dharma kva cid eva vyavasthitam
mānaṃ prati samīpaṃ vā sādṛśyena pratīyate
bhede+api tulyarūpatvāc chālīmṃ tān iti dṛśyate
kathaṃ hy avayavo+anyasya syād anya iti cocyate
atyantabhede nānātvaṃ yatra tattvaṃ na vidyate
saṅghinor na tv abhedo+asti tathānyatvam udāhṛtam
yo hi gaur iti vijñāne hetuḥ so+asti gavāntare
na kaś cid upakāro+asti buddher buddhyantaraṃ prati
kiṃ cid yatrāsti sāmānyaṃ yadi bhedāś ca ke cana
gotvaṃ goṣv asti sāmānyaṃ bhedāś ca śabalādayaḥ
sāmānyaṃ śyāmatānyaiva tad dhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayoḥ
tad eva siddhyasiddhibhyāṃ bheda ity apadiśyate
śyāmatvam eva sāmānyam anyeṣām ubhayoḥ sthitam
saṃpūrnatvāt tad anyasmād viśeṣa iti gamyate
ākṛtau vāpi sāmānye kva cid eva vyavasthitāḥ
jāter abhede bhede vā sādṛśyaṃ tat pracakṣate
kaś cit kadā cit arthātmā tathābhūto+apadiśyate
yatrārthe pratyayābhedo na kadā cid vikalpate
sa sādṛśyasya viṣaya ity anyair apadiśyate
śyāmatvam upamāne ced vṛttaṃ vṛttau prayujyate
ṭābanta eva caitrādau śyāmāśabdas tathā bhavet
satiśiṣṭabalīyastvād bāhye ṅiṣi ca saty api
upamānasvaro na syāt tasmāt stryantaḥ samasyate
pradhānasya tathā na syād vyāghrādau liṅgadarśanam
mṛgīva capalety atra puṃvadbhāvo na sidhyati
yathaiva mṛgadugdhādau na cet stryartho vivakṣyate
śyāmā śastrī yathā śyāmā śastrīkalpeti cocyate
atha śyāmeva śastrīyaṃ śyāmety evaṃ prayujyate
śastrī yatheyam śyāmeti tāvad eva pratīyate
pṛthag dvayoḥ śruto+apy eṣa neṣṭasvārthasya vācakaḥ
upameyaṃ tu yad vācyaṃ tasya cet pratipādane
sādṛśyamātraṃ sāmānyaṃ dviṣṭhaṃ kaiś cit pratīyate
guṇo bhede+apy abhedena dvivṛttir vā vivakṣitaḥ
rūpāt sāmānyavācitvaṃ prāg vā vṛtter udāhṛtam
pūjopādhiś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ kutsanopādhayaś ca ye
asaṃbhave+api vā vṛtteḥ syād etal liṅgadarśanam
acver iti yathā liṅgam abhāve+api bhṛśādiṣu
kriyety upādhiḥ prāthamyāt prakṛtyarthasya yady api
sattvavṛttasya śeṣe vā tṛtīyā sādhane+api vā
tiṅām asattvavācitvād ubhayaṃ tan na vidyate
na kevalau dravyaguṇau tadvān vāpy upamīyate
hotavyasadṛśo hotety atrāpy artho na vidyate
kriyāvad api kāryāṇāṃ darśanāt pratyayo bhavet
gamanaṃ kārakasyeti ṇvuly anyasmin na saṃbhavet
śuddhāyāḥ saṃbhavān na syāt kriyāyā brāhmaṇādiṣu
kriyāyā na śrutād yasmād upamānaṃ samāpyate
tṛtīyo+apy āśrito bhedo dharmaḥ sādhāraṇo dvayoḥ
vyāpāravān na kṛtsnasya sāmyaṃ kṛtsnena vidyate
dravye vāpi kriyāyāṃ vā nimittāt tat prakalpate
kriyāṇāṃ vidyamānatvād vṛttir na syād gavādiṣu
abhāvāt kevalāyās tu tadvān arthaḥ pratīyate
yo ya uccāryate śabdaḥ sa svarūpanibandhanaḥ
antarbhūte tu karaṇe prayogo na punar bhavet
śāstrābhyāsāc ca bhedo+ayam ayuktam iti varṇyate
vivibhaktiḥ prakṛtyarthaṃ praty upādhiḥ kathaṃ bhavet
sārūpyāt tu tad evedam iti tatropacaryate
śabdāntaraṃ vibhaktyā tu yuktaṃ śāstre tad aśrutam
prakṛtiś cet tṛtīyāntā tenety asmāt pratīyate
kriyeti prathamāntā sā kathaṃ bhavitum arhati
kriyayeti tṛtīyā ca prayoge kasya kalpyatām
tenety asya hi saṃbandhaḥ sūtrasthena na vidyate
tena yat tat tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyā cet seti gamyate
upādheḥ kasya cid vākye prayoga upalabhyate
nīlam utpalam ity atra na viśeṣye na bhedake
kaś cit taddharmavacano vākye śabdaḥ prayujyate
atyantānugamāt tatra na sūtre na ca vigrahe
tṛtīyāntaṃ kriyety etad vigrahe na prayujyate
yathā daṇḍaḥ praharaṇaṃ krīḍāyām iti dṛśyate
ghavidhau yac ca saṃjñāyām iti sūtra udāhṛtam
sarvair viśiṣṭās tair arthair janyante sahacāribhiḥ
buddhayaḥ pratipattṝṇāṃ śabdārthāṃs tān ato viduḥ
kevalānāṃ tu bhāvānāṃ na rūpam avadhāryate
vartate+avayave nāpi nopāttaṃ tyajate kva cit
samūhe ca pradeśe ca pañcālā iti dṛśyate
tathā viśeṣaṇaṃ sarva ity etad upapadyate
ardhaṃ ca pippalī ceti khande śabdaḥ pratīyate
tatrānyasya nivṛttyarthe śabde bhedo na gamyate
yad upavyañjanaṃ jāteḥ sahacāri ca karmasu
samudāyaḥ pradeśo vety evaṃ tasminn anāśrite
yaś ca tulyaśrutir dṛṣṭaḥ samudāye vyavasthitaḥ
nivṛttyarthā śrutir yeṣāṃ bhedas teṣv anapekṣitaḥ
vaktavyaṃ kena dharmeṇa tulyatvaṃ kriyayor iti
caitrāt ṣaṣṭhī prasajyeta yoge śattryādibhir yathā
pāṭhaḥ kadā cit kartavyas tulyau pakṣāv ubhau yataḥ
jahāti jātiṃ dravyaṃ vā tasmān nāvayave sthitaḥ
kriyāyās tu śrutir yasmāt tadvaty arthe+avatiṣṭhate
apekṣaṇīyā śuddhe+arthe tasmād vṛttir na kasya cit
sarvaṃ vāpy ekadeśo vā yasminn āśriyate kva cit
viśeṣavṛttiṃ taṃ sarvam āhur bhede vyavasthitam
samuccayo vikalpo vā prakārāḥ sarva eva vā
na hi brāhmaṇa ity atra bhedaḥ kaś cid apāśritaḥ
kriyā tv āśrīyate yasmin sa bhedo +adhyavasīyate
tathānyathā sarvathā cety aprayoge na vidyate
adhyetā brāhmaṇa iva pratyayo na nivartate
adhīte tulya ity evaṃ puṃlliṅgena viśeṣaṇam
putreṇa tulyaḥ kapila iti vṛttiḥ prasajyate
yāḥ putre rūḍhasaṃbandhāḥ kriyā loke vivakṣitāḥ
tābhiḥ kriyāvataḥ putrād guṇatulye vatir bhavet
antarbhūtaṃ nimittaṃ ca rūḍhiśabdeṣu yady api
kriyās tu sahacāriṇyo rūḍhāḥ santi padārthavat
animittaṃ vates tulyaṃ yātīty atreṣyate vatiḥ
dvayaṃ viśeṣyate tena yad ekatra viśeṣaṇaṃ
tulyaśabdo hi taṃ dharmam ubhayastham apekṣate
sūtre śrutaś ca dviṣṭho+asāv abhedena pratīyate
na ca sāmānyaśabdatvād aśrutā gamyate kriyā
ye dharmā niyatās teṣāṃ putrādiṣu na vidyate
yadā kriyānimittaṃ tu sādṛśyaṃ syāt kriyāvatoḥ
avyayeṣu vateḥ pāṭhaḥ kāryas tatra svarādivat
brāhmaṇena samo+adhyetety atra ca pratyayo bhavet
tulyam ity anyathā kalpyo vākyaśeṣo+aśruto bhavet
adhyetrā sadṛśo+adhyetety atra nāsti vater vidhiḥ
tulyārthair iti yā tasyās tṛtīyāyā na bhidyate
bhojyate brāhmaṇa iva tulyaṃ bhuktaṃ dvijātinā
paśyati brāhmaṇam iva tulyaṃ vipreṇa paśyati
brāhmaṇād iva vaiśyāt tvam adhīṣvādhyayanaṃ bahu
ity evamādibhir bhedas tṛtīyāyā na kaś cana
tulyaṃ madhurayādhīye mātrā tulyaṃ smarāmi tām
madhurāyāś ca mātuś ca kathaṃ sādṛśyakalpanā
ivārthe yac ca vacanaṃ pūrvasūtre ca yo vidhiḥ
kriyāśabdaśrutau bhedo na kaś cid vidyate tayoḥ
yady apy upādhir anyatra niyato na prayujyate
rūpābhedāt tv anirjñātā kriyātra śrūyate punaḥ
evaṃ ca sati pūrveṇa siddho+atrāpi vater vidhiḥ
niyame vābhidhāne vā bhidyate na kriyāśrutiḥ
ity atra dravyaguṇayoḥ pūrveṇa na vatir bhavet
na kā cid ivayoge tu bāhyāt saṃbandhino
ṣaṣṭhī vidhīyate tatra pūrveṇa pratyayo bhavet
ṣaṣṭhītṛtīye tatra stas tulyaśabdo hi vācakaḥ
gavayena samo+anadvān iti vṛttis tathā bhavet
na tv asti gaur ivety atra vyatireka ivāśrayaḥ
prakṛtāṃ tām atas tyaktvā vibhaktyantaraṃ āśritam
saptamy api na tatrāsti jñāpakārthā tu sā kṛtā
saptamy evocyate sarvā na santy anyā vibhaktayaḥ
bādhitā vinivarteta ṣaṣṭhī sā gṛhyate punaḥ
arhārthe+api vatiḥ siddhaḥ sa tv ekena nidarśyate
tena tulyam iti prāpte kriyopādhiḥ prasidhyati
rājavad vartate rājety atra bhede vivakṣite
rājavad rūpam asyeti rājany eva vivakṣite
kṛtahastavad ity etat prasiddheṣv eva dṛśyate
rājatvena prasiddhe ca rājñi rājavad ity api
arhateś ca kriyā kartrī yā tasyāṃ vatir iṣyate
rājānam arhati cchattram iti na tv evamādiṣu
chattrādyarthe tu vacane pratyākhyānaṃ na saṃbhavet
prayogaḥ so+api caitasya viṣaye vidyate vateḥ
tenāsmin viṣaye bhinnam abhinnaṃ vā na vidyate
janyanta iva śabdānām arthāḥ sarve vivakṣayā
na tatra kaś cit sādṛśyaṃ sad api pratipadyate
atyantaṃ viṣaye bhinne yāvat prakhyā na bhidyate
na tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ kasya cid vinivartate
ayam eva tu sūtreṇa bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ
ke cit pumāṃso bhāṣante strīvat puṃvac ca yoṣitaḥ
sadṛśas tvaṃ tavaiveti loke yad abhidhīyate
yuktam aupayikaṃ rājña ity arthasya nidarśane
svaṃ rūpam iti caitasminn arthasyāpi parigrahaḥ
dhātunā kṛtam ity evam asmin sūtre pratīyate
yaḥ śabdaś caritārthatvād atyantaṃ na prayujyate
kriyāyāṃ sādhane dravye prādayo ye vyavasthitāḥ
pratyayena vinā prādis tatrārthe na prayujyate
teṣām udvata ity atra vaktavyā savibhaktitā
vatyarthaṃ nāvagāhete puṃvad ity asya darśanāt
etam utkrāmato nūnaṃ vatyarthaṃ nañsnañāv iti
nañsnañau vihitau yena sa yogo nāvagāhate
vatiprakaraṇaṃ tad dhi liṅgam evaṃ samarthyate
paśū rudra iva hy etāv ity ekavacanaśrutiḥ
upamānasya bhedāc ca bahuṣu syād año vidhiḥ
kāśyapā iti lopaḥ syāt tathā pratikṛtiṣv api
lum manuṣye tathoktaṃ syāl liṅgasyaikasya siddhaye
upameyeṣu bhinneṣu kiṃ cid ekaṃ pravartate
pratyayasya vidhau tatra nityaṃ yuktavad iṣyate
yadā pratyupameyaṃ tu tad ekaikam avasthitam
pracaye bhidyamāne tu saṃkhyā pūleṣu bhidyate
arthabhedo lubanteṣu naivaṃ kaś cana dṛśyate
yaḥ saṃbandhigato bhedaḥ sa prayoge pratīyate
saṃbandhinām ato bheda upameye na gamyate
upamānaṃ samastānām abhinnam śrūyate kva cit
yathā garuḍa ity etad vyūhāpekṣaṃ prayujyate
meghāḥ śaila ivety ukte samastānāṃ pratīyate
kākatālīyam ity atra prasiddham hy upalakṣaṇam
rājāśvādiś ca viṣayaḥ syād anyo vety aniścitam
tena cchasya vidhānāt prāg vyapadeśo na vidyate
dasyor abhinipātas tu tālasya patanaṃ yathā
yad anvākhyāyakaṃ vākyaṃ tad evaṃ parikalpyate
prayogavākvaṃ yal loke tad evaṃ na prayujyate
kākasya tālena yathā vadho yasya tu dasyunā
bṛhatka iti tatraiṣa maṇau śabdaḥ prayujyate
sādṛśyam eva sarvatra prakāraḥ kaiś cid iṣyate
bhede+api tu prakārākhyā kaiś cid abhyupagamyate
prakāramātre vartitvā kaś cit tadvati vartate
sa cāyam avyayībhāve bhedo bhedena darśitaḥ
sādṛśyaṃ yogyatā kaiś cid anāv abhyupagamyate
yat tu mūrtigataṃ sāmyaṃ tat sahenābhidhīyate
gaur vāhīka iti dvitve sādṛśyaṃ pratyudāhṛtam
śuklādau sati niṣpanne vāhīko na dvir ucyate
